analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs so //
translated: The knowledge of all modes is form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed @238b rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed @238b rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: Likewise feeling, likewise perception, likewise the formative forces, likewise consciousness itself is the knowledge of all modes.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of all modes is consciousness.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags  pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags  pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /
translated: The suchness of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one and the same suchness.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the eyes are one and the same suchness.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind are one and the same suchness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /🔽gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de / gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of form are one and the same suchness.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of sounds, smells, tastes, tangibles, and dharmas are one and the same suchness.

original: 'di ltar mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: 'di ltar mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the eyes are one and the same suchness.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind are one and the same suchness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig lags so //🔽de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig lags so // de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the eye constituent are one and the same suchness.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thinking-mind constituents are one and the same suchness.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the form constituent are one and the same suchness.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the sound, smell, taste, texture, and dharmas constituents are one and the same suchness.🔽The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the eye constituent are one and the same suchness.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid lags te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid lags te /
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thinking-mind constituents are one and the same suchness.🔽The such

original: mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the eyes and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
translated: That suchness is not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
translated: Similarly, the suchness of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
translated: That suchness is not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: 'di ltar gzugs rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
translated: In the same vein, Subhūti, physical forms are the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam @239a *// pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs rnams lags so //
analyzed: rnam @239a *// pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs rnams lags so //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is physical forms.

original: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
translated: Similarly, sounds, odors, tastes, tangibles, and mental phenomena are the knowledge of all aspects,🔽and the knowledge of all aspects is sounds, odors, tastes, tangibles, and mental phenomena.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chos rnams lags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chos rnams lags so //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is dharmas.

original: 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
translated: Thus, the suchness of form and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
translated: It is not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: de bzhin du mig gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
translated: Similarly, the eye constituent is the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig gi khams lags te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig gi khams lags te /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is the eye constituent.

original: mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
translated: The suchness of the eye and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
translated: It is not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: 'di ltar gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: In this way, the form element, the eye-consciousness element, the ear element, the sound element, the ear-consciousness element, the nose element, the smell element, the nose-consciousness element,

original: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams @239b nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams @239b nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
translated: the tongue element, the taste element, the tongue-consciousness element, the body element, the tactile element, the body-consciousness element, the thinking-mind element, the dharma element, and the thinking-mind-consciousness element are the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams lags te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams lags te /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is the thinking-mind-consciousness element.

original: de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
translated: Thus, the suchness of the suchness of the mind-consciousness element and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
translated: That suchness is not two and is not divided.

original: de bzhin du 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
translated: Similarly, the applications of mindfulness are the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams lags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams lags so //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is the applications of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba gang lags pa dag dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba gang lags pa dag dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Similarly, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and so on,

original: 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /
translated: and similarly, the noble eightfold path is the knowledge of all aspects,🔽and the knowledge of all aspects is the noble eightfold path.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags te /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the noble eightfold path.

original: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
translated: Thus, the suchness of the noble eightfold path and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so //
translated: That suchness is not two and cannot be made two.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang dag lags pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @240a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang dag lags pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @240a *//
translated: Similarly, the ten powers of the tathāgatas are the knowledge of all aspects,

original: pa nyid gang lags pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lags so //
analyzed: pa nyid gang lags pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lags so //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this with each, up to🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are the knowledge of all aspects,🔽and the knowledge of all aspects is the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /🔽gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so; ;de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de / gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so; ;de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha and the suchness of omniscience are one suchness.🔽That suchness is not two and is not divided.

original: lha dag / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha dag / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One said to those gods, “Gods, it is so!

original: ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la /
translated: Form itself is omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs yin no //
translated: Omniscience is form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la /
translated: Similarly, feeling itself, perception itself, volitional factors themselves, and consciousness itself are omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa yin te /
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is consciousness.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
translated: The suchness of form and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: That suchness is not two and is not divided.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
translated: Similarly, the suchness of feeling, perception, and volitional factors, and the suchness of consciousness, and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.🔽That suchness is not two and is not divided.🔽In the same vein,🔽Subhūti, the suchness of the eyes and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.🔽That suchness is not two and is not divided.🔽Similarly, the suchness of the ears, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind, and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: @240b gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: @240b gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: That suchness is not two and is not divided.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein, as before,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /

translated: The suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha and the suchness of omniscience are one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: That suchness is not two nor divided.

original: lha dag / don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni thugs kyi 'phrin las chung ba la gzhol bar mdzad kyi chos ston pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lha dag / don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni thugs kyi 'phrin las chung ba la gzhol bar mdzad kyi chos ston pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: “Gods, the Tathāgata’s mind is inclined to little activity of mind, not to teaching the Dharma.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: lha dag / kye ma chos 'di ni zab ste /
analyzed: lha dag / kye ma chos 'di ni zab ste /
translated: “Gods, this Dharma is profound,

original: mthong bar dka' ba /
analyzed: mthong bar dka' ba /
translated: difficult to see,

original: rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: difficult to understand,

original: brtag par mi nus pa /
analyzed: brtag par mi nus pa /
translated: inaccessible to reasoning,🔽and incomprehensible to reasoning.

analyzed: zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin te /
translated: It is to be known by the wise and learned who investigate it,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa de ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa de ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te /
translated: In it no Buddha has been fully known,

original: de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas /🔽gang las kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas /
analyzed: de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas / gang las kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas /
translated: by it no Buddha has been fully known,

original: gang du'ang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te /
analyzed: gang du'ang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te /
translated: and in it no Buddha has been fully known.

original: lha dag / 'di ni gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba'ang med pa'i chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lha dag / 'di ni gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba'ang med pa'i chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Gods, it is because this is the profundity of dharmas in which there is no duality at all.

original: lha dag / nam mkha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / nam mkha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this dharma is profound because space is profound.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du de bzhin nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i @241a *//
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du de bzhin nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i @241a *//
translated: Gods, it is because suchness is profound, the dharma-element is profound, the very limit of reality is profound, the inconceivable is profound, the unutterable is profound, the unborn is profound, the non-existent is profound, the non-arising is profound, the unceasing is profound, the uneffected is profound, the unconditioned is profound, the self is profound, sentient beings, living beings, creatures, people, personalities, individuals, humankind, human beings, agents, experiencers, knowers, viewers, are profound, and the five skandhas are profound.

original: dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mtha' yas shing mthar thug pa med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
analyzed: dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mtha' yas shing mthar thug pa med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
translated: Because the realm is profound, because it is profound in being infinite and limitless, because it is profound in being without coming or going, and because it is profound in being without origination, without cessation,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: without affliction, and without purification.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du bdag zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du bdag zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this teaching is profound because the self is profound, up to because the knower and the seer are profound.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du gzugs zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du gzugs zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this teaching is profound because form is profound.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po //
translated: Similarly, this teaching is profound because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are profound.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du mig zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du mig zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this teaching is profound because the eyes are profound.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this teaching is profound because of the profundity of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty.

original: lha dag / gzugs rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / gzugs rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this teaching is profound because of the profundity of sights.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this teaching is profound because of the profundity of sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this teaching is profound because of the profundity of the eye constituent, the form constituent, and the eye consciousness constituent.

original: rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this teaching is profound because of the profundity of the ear constituent, the sound constituent, and the ear consciousness constituent.

original: lha dag / de bzhin @241b du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin @241b du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this teaching is profound because of the profundity of the nose constituent, the smell constituent, and the nose consciousness constituent.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this doctrine is profound because of the profundity of the ear constituent, the sound constituent, and the ear-consciousness constituent.🔽Gods, this doctrine is profound because of the profundity of the nose constituent, the smell constituent, and the nose-consciousness constituent.🔽Gods, this doctrine is profound because of the profundity of the tongue constituent, the taste constituent, and the tongue-consciousness constituent.

original: lha dag / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this doctrine is profound because of the profundity of the body constituent, the tangible constituent, and the body-consciousness constituent.

original: lha dag / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: lha dag / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: Gods, this doctrine is profound because of the profundity of the thinking-mind constituent, the entity constituent, and the thinking-mind-consciousness constituent.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Gods, this doctrine is profound because of the profundity of the perfection of generosity, the perfection of conduct, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
translated: outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po @242a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po @242a *//
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of essential nature,🔽and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is due to the non-apprehension, the non-observation of form, etc.

original: med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: emptiness of non-existence, emptiness of own-being, emptiness of the non-existence of own-being.

original: lha dag / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
translated: Gods, this Dharma is profound because of the profundity of the applications of mindfulness, and similarly because of the profundity of the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: and the noble eightfold path.

original: lha dag / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po //🔽lha dag / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: lha dag / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po //🔽lha dag / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Gods, this Dharma is profound because of the profundity of the ten powers of the Tathāgata.🔽Gods, this Dharma is profound because of the profundity of the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo //
translated: up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are profound, up to the knowledge of all aspects is profound, this Dharma is profound.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: When this had been said, those gods said to the Lord:

original: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos 'di bstan to //
analyzed: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos 'di bstan to //
translated: “Oh! The Lord has taught this Dharma that is incompatible with the whole world.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /🔽chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'am /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'am /
translated: Venerable Lord!

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am /
translated: This Dharma has not been taught for the sake of apprehending form,🔽or for the sake of not apprehending it.🔽It has not been taught for the sake of apprehending feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am /
translated: or for the sake of not apprehending them.🔽Similarly, it has not been taught for the sake of apprehending the eyes,

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: or for the sake of not apprehending them.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna @242b dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba'am /🔽mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽gzugs rnams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna @242b dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba'am / mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / gzugs rnams gzung ba'am /
translated: Likewise, it is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gzung ba'am /
translated: It is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending forms.

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: It is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending sounds, smells, tastes, textures, or mental phenomena.

original: de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /🔽mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am / mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
translated: It is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending the eye constituent, form constituent, or eye consciousness constituent.🔽It is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending the ear constituent, sound constituent, or ear consciousness constituent.

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: It is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending the nose constituent, smell constituent, or nose consciousness constituent.

original: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
translated: It is not for the sake of grasping or not grasping the tongue element,

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
translated: the taste element, or the tongue consciousness element that the doctrine is taught.🔽It is not for the sake of grasping or not grasping the body element,

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
translated: the tactile-object element, or the body consciousness element that the doctrine is taught.🔽It is not for the sake of grasping or not grasping the thinking-mind element,

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am /
translated: the dharma element, or the thinking-mind consciousness element that the doctrine is taught.

original: mi gzung bar ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung bar ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: Similarly, it is not for the sake of grasping or not grasping the perfection of giving that the doctrine is taught.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @243a *//
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @243a *//
translated: It is not for the sake of grasping or not grasping the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom that the doctrine is taught.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am /
translated: It is not that the perfection of wisdom is taught in order to grasp or not grasp

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'am /
translated: the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /🔽phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Similarly, it is not that the emptiness of internal phenomena is taught in order to grasp or not grasp🔽the emptiness of internal phenomena.🔽It is not that the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,🔽and the emptiness of non-apprehension are taught in order to grasp or not grasp🔽those.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am /
translated: the emptiness of nonapprehension, the emptiness of nonthings, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of essential nature of nonthings.

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: “It is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending

original: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am /
translated: the applications of mindfulness that the Thus-Gone One teaches the Dharma.

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: It is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending🔽the right efforts,🔽the legs of miraculous power,🔽the faculties,🔽the powers,🔽the branches of awakening,

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'am /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'am /
translated: or the noble eightfold path that the Thus-Gone One teaches the Dharma.

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: It is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am /
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas that the Thus-Gone One teaches the Dharma.

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: It is not for the sake of apprehending or not apprehending🔽the four fearlessnesses,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: the four kinds of exact knowledge,

original: sangs rgyas @243b kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas @243b kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am /
translated: up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽

original: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
translated: up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not taught in order to grasp or not grasp them.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /🔽de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'am /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'am /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: me gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
analyzed: me gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags /
translated: similarly, this Dharma is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'am /🔽mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'am / mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags so //
translated: the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, or the knowledge of all aspects.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: 'jig rten ni bdag gzugs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten ni bdag gzugs so //
translated: the world is ‘I am form,’

original: de bzhin du bdag tshor ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag tshor ba'o //
translated: similarly, ‘I am feeling,’

original: bdag 'du shes so //🔽bdag 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: bdag 'du shes so // bdag 'du byed rnams so //
translated: ‘I am perception,’🔽‘I am volitional factors,’

original: bdag gi 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: bdag gi 'du byed rnams so //
translated: ‘volitional factors are mine,’

original: bdag rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: bdag rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: ‘I am consciousness,’

original: de bzhin du bdag mig go /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag mig go /
translated: In the same way, ‘I am the eyes.

original: bdag gi mig go /🔽bdag rna ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gi mig go / bdag rna ba'o //
translated: I am the eyes’ owner.🔽I am the ears.

original: bdag gi rna ba'o //
analyzed: bdag gi rna ba'o //
translated: I am the ears’ owner.

original: sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin no //
translated: I am the nose, the tongue, the body, and the mind.’

original: de bzhin du bdag cag ni gzugs rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag cag ni gzugs rnams so //
translated: In the same way, ‘I am sights.

original: sgra dang / dri dang; ro dang / reg bya rnams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang; ro dang / reg bya rnams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: I am sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.

original: bdag cag chos rnams so //
analyzed: bdag cag chos rnams so //
translated: I am mental phenomena.

original: bdag cag gi chos rnams so //
analyzed: bdag cag gi chos rnams so //
translated: I am the owner of mental phenomena.’

original: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The eye constituent, the form constituent, and the eye-consciousness constituent are the same.

original: de bzhin du bdag rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam @244a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam @244a *//
translated: In the same way, ‘I am the ear constituent, the sound constituent, and the ear-consciousness constituent. I am the nose constituent, the smell constituent, and the nose-consciousness constituent. I am the tongue constituent, the taste constituent, and the tongue-consciousness constituent. I am the body constituent, the touch constituent, and the body-consciousness constituent. I am the thinking-mind constituent, the mental-phenomena constituent, and the thinking-mind-consciousness constituent.’

original: par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang /🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: the element of the tongue, the element of tastes, the element of the tongue consciousness, the element of the body, the element of tangibles, the element of the body consciousness, the element of the mind, the element of mental phenomena,🔽and the element of the mind consciousness.

original: bdag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: “My mind consciousness.”

original: de bzhin du bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Similarly, “I am the perfection of generosity,

original: bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: I am the perfection of generosity.”

original: de bzhin du bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Similarly, “I am the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, and the perfection of meditation.

original: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: I am the perfection of wisdom.”

original: de bzhin du bdag gi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Likewise, it is the emptiness of the internal, the emptiness of the external, the emptiness of the internal and the external, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great immensity, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the conditioned,🔽the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of beginning and end, the emptiness of non-discarded, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / bdag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / bdag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa @244b nyid do //
analyzed: bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa @244b nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the non-existence of things is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: de bzhin du bdag cag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //🔽bdag cag gi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag cag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so // bdag cag gi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so //
translated: Similarly, we are the applications of mindfulness.🔽We are the right efforts,🔽the legs of miraculous power,🔽the faculties,🔽the powers,

original: de bzhin du bdag cag yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag cag yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
translated: and the limbs of awakening.

original: bdag cag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: bdag cag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
translated: We are the noble eightfold path.

original: de bzhin du bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o //
translated: We are the ten powers of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag go /
analyzed: bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag go /
translated: we are the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de bzhin du bdag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //🔽bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o //🔽bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas /
translated: We are the fruit of entering the stream.🔽We are the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i bar dag go /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i bar dag go /
translated: the fruit of once-returner, the fruit of non-returner, and the fruit of arhatship.

original: bdag rang byang chub bo //
analyzed: bdag rang byang chub bo //
translated: I am a pratyekabuddha.🔽I am omniscience.

original: bdag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //🔽bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa la spyod pa lags so ////🔽'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
analyzed: bdag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do // bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa la spyod pa lags so //// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
translated: I am omniscience.”🔽Noble Mahāyāna Sūtra

original: bam po nyi shu gsum pa /
analyzed: bam po nyi shu gsum pa /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom in a Hundred Thousand Lines🔽The Blessed One replied to the gods,

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //🔽lha dag / de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // lha dag / de de bzhin te /
translated: “Gods, it is so!

original: lha dag / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha dag / de de bzhin no //
translated: Gods, it is so!

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: lha dag / chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'am /🔽mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: lha dag / chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'am / mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: Gods, this Dharma is not taught in order to apprehend form🔽or to apprehend formlessness.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes @245a *//
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes @245a *//
translated: It is not taught in order to apprehend feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness🔽or to apprehend formlessness.

original: pa gzung ba'am /
analyzed: pa gzung ba'am /
translated: Or,🔽

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /🔽de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin / de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am /
translated: It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp the ear.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp the nose.🔽It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp the tongue.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba'am /
translated: It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp the body.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /🔽gzugs rnams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin / gzugs rnams gzung ba'am /
translated: It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp the mind.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp sights.🔽It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp sounds.

original: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gzung ba'am /
translated: It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp smells.🔽It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp tastes.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp tangibles.🔽It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp mental phenomena.

original: de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /🔽mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am / mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp the eye constituent, the form constituent, or the eye consciousness constituent.

original: de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
translated: It is not taught in order to grasp or not grasp the ear constituent, the sound constituent, or the ear consciousness constituent.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: It is not taught in order to apprehend or not apprehend the element of the nose,

original: sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
translated: the element of smells, or the element of nose consciousness.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: It is not taught in order to apprehend or not apprehend the element of the tongue,

original: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
translated: the element of tastes, or the element of tongue consciousness.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: It is not taught in order to apprehend or not apprehend the element of the body,

original: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
translated: the element of textures, or the element of body consciousness.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: It is not taught in order to apprehend or not apprehend the element of the mental faculty,

original: yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams @245b gzung ba'am /🔽me gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams @245b gzung ba'am /🔽me gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: the element of mental phenomena, or the element of mental consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am /
translated: Similarly, the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration,

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom are not taught for the sake of grasping or not grasping.

original: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Similarly, inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stod pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stod pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am /
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /🔽de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of nonapprehension, the emptiness of nonexistence, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence are not taught in order to be grasped or not grasped.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not taught in order to be grasped or not grasped.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'am /
translated: Likewise, it is not the case that the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous action, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, or the eightfold noble path are apprehended or not apprehended.

original: mi gzung @246a *//🔽bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am /
analyzed: mi gzung @246a *// bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am /
translated: Similarly, it is not for the sake of grasping or not grasping the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, or the noble eightfold path.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: It is not for the sake of grasping or not grasping the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am /
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin zhing /
translated: It is not for the sake of grasping or not grasping the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lha dag / chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'am /🔽mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: lha dag / chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'am /🔽mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: It is not for the sake of grasping or not grasping the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'od ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub gzung ba'am /🔽mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'od ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub gzung ba'am / mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin /
translated: the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, arhatship, and individual enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: It is not taught for the sake of grasping or not grasping

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'am /🔽mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'am / mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin na /
translated: the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lha dag / gang zag gang dag gzugs gzung ba'am /🔽spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am /
analyzed: lha dag / gang zag gang dag gzugs gzung ba'am / spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am /
translated: “Gods, those persons who practice for the sake of grasping or abandoning form🔽and similarly who practice for the sake of grasping or abandoning feeling,

original: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so //
translated: perception, volitional factors, or consciousness are not able to cultivate the perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: and likewise, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi @246b nus so //🔽de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am /🔽spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi @246b nus so // de bzhin du mig gzung ba'am / spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba'am /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom.🔽Similarly, they practice in order to grasp the eyes🔽and abandon them, and likewise, they practice in order to grasp and abandon the ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

original: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams gzung ba'am /
translated: Similarly, they practice in order to grasp and abandon sights, sounds, odors, tastes, tangibles, and mental phenomena.

original: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /🔽spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang /
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am / spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang /
translated: to practice in order to abandon the eye element,🔽the form element, and the eye consciousness element,

original: ri'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: ri'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am /
translated: to practice in order to abandon the ear element, the sound element, and the ear consciousness element, the nose element, the smell element, and the nose consciousness element, the tongue element, the taste element, and the tongue consciousness element, the body element, the tangible element, and the body consciousness element, and the mind element, the dharma element, and the mind consciousness element.

original: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the transcendent perfection of diligence,🔽the transcendent perfection of concentration,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am /
translated: and the transcendent perfection of wisdom,🔽in order to adopt or reject them.🔽Similarly, they practice inner emptiness,

original: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi @247a *//
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi @247a *//
translated: outer emptiness,🔽inner and outer emptiness,🔽the emptiness of emptiness,🔽great emptiness,🔽ultimate emptiness,🔽conditioned emptiness,🔽unconditioned emptiness,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' yas 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: and infinite emptiness,🔽in order to adopt or reject them.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless, the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-observation,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am /
translated: the emptiness of the nonexistence of things, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence.

original: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am /
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am /
translated: They do not engage for the purpose of grasping or rejecting the applications of mindfulness,

original: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du gzung ba'am /
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du gzung ba'am /
translated: the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, or the path of the noble ones.

original: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am /🔽spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am / spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and similarly, they practice in order to grasp or reject the ten powers of the tathāgatas, and similarly, connect this with each, up to

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am /
translated: they practice in order to grasp or reject the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom par mi nus /
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom par mi nus /
translated: “They practice in order to grasp or reject the four applications of mindfulness,

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub @247b kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par mi nus la /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub @247b kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par mi nus la /
translated: and similarly, they practice in order to grasp or reject the four correct exertions, the four supports for miraculous ability, the five faculties, the five powers, and the seven branches of enlightenment.

original: de dag gis ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus /
analyzed: de dag gis ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus /
translated: They practice in order to grasp or reject the noble eightfold path,

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and similarly, they practice in order to grasp or reject the ten powers of the tathāgatas, and similarly, connect this with each, up to

original: de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus /
analyzed: de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus /
translated: they practice in order to grasp or reject the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de dag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so //
analyzed: de dag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so //
