translated: They are unable to cultivate up to the knowledge of all modes.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽bcun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // bcun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Then the venerable Subhuti spoke thus to the Lord:

original: chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: The Dharma, O Lord, is in harmony with all dharmas.

original: ji ltar na chos 'di chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags she na /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos 'di chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags she na /
translated: In what way is this Dharma in harmony with all dharmas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is thus:

original: chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: this Dharma is in harmony with the perfection of wisdom.

original: chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the perfection of concentration.

original: de bzhin du chos 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: Similarly, this Dharma is in harmony with the perfection of energy.

original: chos 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the perfection of patience.

original: chos 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: This Dharma is in harmony with the perfection of morality.

original: chos 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: This Dharma accords with the perfection of generosity.

original: chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang mthun pa nas /
analyzed: chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang mthun pa nas /
translated: This Dharma accords with inner emptiness,

original: chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun lags so //
translated: up to this Dharma accords with the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang mthun pa nas /
analyzed: chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang mthun pa nas /
translated: This Dharma accords with the applications of mindfulness,

original: chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang mthun pa lags so //🔽de bzhin du chos 'di ni de @248a *//
analyzed: chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang mthun pa lags so // de bzhin du chos 'di ni de @248a *//
translated: up to this Dharma accords with the eightfold noble path.

original: bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Similarly, this Dharma accords with the ten powers of the tathāgatas,🔽and in the same vein, this Dharma accords with , up to and including the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: chos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang mthun pa lags so; ;de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang mthun pa lags so; ;de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: Similarly, this Dharma accords with the fruit of entering the stream.

original: de bzhin du chos 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: Similarly, this Dharma accords with the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth.

original: chos 'di ni phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: This Dharma accords with the fruit of non-returning.

original: chos 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: This Dharma accords with the fruit of arhatship.

original: chos 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so //
translated: This Dharma accords with the fruit of pratyekabuddhahood.

original: chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa lags te /
analyzed: chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa lags te /
translated: This Dharma accords with omniscience.

original: chos 'di ni gang du'ang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni gang du'ang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so //
translated: This Dharma is unobstructed anywhere.

original: ji ltar na thogs pa ma mchis pa lags she na /
analyzed: ji ltar na thogs pa ma mchis pa lags she na /
translated: How is it unobstructed?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so //
analyzed: gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so //
translated: It is unobstructed in form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so //
translated: It is unobstructed in feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this with each, up to

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor!

original: nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du chos gnas pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang; bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du chos gnas pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang; bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: and similarly, because of emptiness,🔽signlessness,🔽and the sameness of wishlessness,

original: smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang / skye ba med pa dang / @248b 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du /
analyzed: smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang / skye ba med pa dang / @248b 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du /
translated: and because of the sameness of nonproduction, noncessation, nondefilement, and nonpurification,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid lags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid lags so //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects has the defining characteristic of being unobstructed.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: gzugs kyi skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: because the arising of form is non-apprehensible, and similarly, because the arising of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is non-apprehensible, and in the same vein,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: because the arising of , up to and including omniscience, is non-apprehensible.

original: chos 'di skye ba ma mchis pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di skye ba ma mchis pa lags so //
translated: “Lord, this doctrine is non-arising.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Venerable Lord!

original: gzugs kyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: because the basis of form is non-apprehensible, and similarly, because the basis of feeling, perception, and volitional factors is non-apprehensible, and because the basis of consciousness is non-apprehensible, and in the same vein,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du /
translated: because the basis of , up to and including omniscience, is non-apprehensible.

original: chos 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so //
analyzed: chos 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so //
translated: “Lord, this doctrine is non-apprehensible.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the gods of the desire realm and the gods of the form realm said to the Blessed One:

original: bcun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽the elder Subhūti, a disciple of the Blessed One,

original: nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su skyes pa lags so //
analyzed: nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su skyes pa lags so //
translated: is born after the Blessed One.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that, Blessed One?

original: bcun pa bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang / @249a *//
analyzed: bcun pa bcom ldan 'das / 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang / @249a *//
translated: Blessed One,

original: stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel bar ston pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel bar ston pa'i slad du'o //
translated: it is because the elder Subhūti teaches everything he teaches in connection with emptiness and in relation to emptiness.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: ” Then the venerable Subhūti said to those gods:

original: lha dag / gang 'di skad du nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so //
analyzed: lha dag / gang 'di skad du nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so //
translated: “Gods, you say, ‘The elder Subhūti, a disciple of the Blessed One, is born after the Blessed One.

original: zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: zhes zer ba la /

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor gang gi rjes su skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor gang gi rjes su skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: Why is it that the elder Subhūti is born after?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin /🔽ci re zhig gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin / ci re zhig gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: He is born after the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin na ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin na ni /
translated: If the elder Subhūti is born after the Tathāgata because he is born after suchness,

original: de bzhin nyid de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
translated: then suchness does not come from anywhere,

original: gang du'ang ma song la /
analyzed: gang du'ang ma song la /
translated: nor does it go anywhere.

original: de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
translated: In the same way, the suchness of the elder Subhūti does not come from anywhere,

original: gang du'ang ma song ste /
analyzed: gang du'ang ma song ste /
translated: nor does it go anywhere.

original: de ltar na ni gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na ni gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
translated: In that case, the elder Subhūti is born after the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin zhing /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is also the suchness of all phenomena,

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa /
translated: and the suchness of all phenomena

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de yin la /
translated: is also the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid med pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid med pa yin te /
translated: The thusness of the Thus-Gone One is not thusness.

original: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the elder Subhūti is born after the Thus-Gone One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin no /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin no /
translated: The thusness of the Thus-Gone One is also the thusness of the elder Subhūti.

original: de ltar na gnas brtan rab @249b 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na gnas brtan rab @249b 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the elder Subhūti is born after the Thus-Gone One.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang la'ang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang la'ang thogs pa med de /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang la'ang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang la'ang thogs pa med de /
translated: Just as the thusness of the Thus-Gone One is unobstructed, so the thusness of all phenomena is also unobstructed.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de /
translated: The thusness of the Thus-Gone One and the thusness of all phenomena are one thusness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: They are not two but indivisible.

original: de bzhin nyid de ni ma byas pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de ni ma byas pa ste /
translated: That suchness is not made.

original: de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: It is never not suchness.

original: gang gi phyir de rtag tu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i phyir de gnyis su med cing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de rtag tu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i phyir de gnyis su med cing /
translated: Because it is always suchness, therefore it is nondual.

original: gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: It is indivisible.

original: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
translated: In this way the elder Subhūti is born after the Tathāgata.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad cing bye brag med la /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad cing bye brag med la /
translated: Just as the suchness of the Tathāgata is not different, is not distinct,

original: gnyis su med pa de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no //
translated: and is nondual, in the same way the elder Subhūti is born after the Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na med la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na med la /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is not separate from the suchness of all phenomena.

original: de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: It is never not suchness.

original: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir rjes su skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir rjes su skyes pa yin no //
translated: In this way, because it is not different from the elder Subhūti, it is born after.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa ma yin /
translated: The thusness of the Tathāgata is not past,

original: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
translated: not future,

original: da ltar byung ba ma yin la /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma yin la /
translated: and not present.

original: de de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin /
analyzed: de de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin /
translated: In the same way, the thusness of all phenomena is not past,

original: ma 'ongs pa ma @250a *//
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ma @250a *//
translated: not future,

original: yin / da ltar byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: yin / da ltar byung ba ma yin te /
translated: and not present.

original: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, the elder Subhūti is said to be born after the Tathāgata.

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la /
translated: The thusness of the past is the thusness of the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid yin no //
translated: and the thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the past.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la /
translated: The thusness of the future is the thusness of the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin no //
translated: and the thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the future.

original: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la /
translated: The thusness of the present is the thusness of the Tathāgata,🔽and the thusness of the Tathāgata is the thusness of the present.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid yin te /
translated: The suchness of the Tathāgata is the suchness of the present.

original: de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: Thus, the suchness of the past, future, and present, the suchness of the Tathāgata, and suchness are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: de bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
translated: Similarly, the suchness of form and the suchness of the Tathāgata, the suchness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness and the suchness of the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do; ;de bzhin du bdag gi de bzhin nyid nas /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do; ;de bzhin du bdag gi de bzhin nyid nas /
translated: that suchness is not two and cannot be divided into two. Similarly, the suchness of a self and the suchness of a sentient being,

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su @250b med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su @250b med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: The suchness of the one who knows and the one who sees, and the suchness of the Tathāgata, that suchness is not two nor divided.

original: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: Similarly, the suchness of the perfection of giving, and the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the perfection of wisdom, and the suchness of the Tathāgata, that suchness is not two nor divided.

original: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
translated: Similarly, the suchness of inner emptiness, and the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, and the suchness of the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //🔽de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do // de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
translated: That suchness is nondual and indivisible.🔽Similarly, the suchness of the applications of mindfulness,

original: de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do //
translated: the suchness of the Tathā­gata, up to the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and the suchness of the Tathā­gata are nondual and indivisible.🔽Similarly, the suchness of the result of stream enterer,

original: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: the suchness of the Tathā­gata, and in the same vein,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de /
translated: the suchness of , up to and including omniscience, and the suchness of the Tathā­gata are nondual and indivisible.

original: lha dag / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de bzhin nyid gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom @251a *//
analyzed: lha dag / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de bzhin nyid gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom @251a *//
translated: The gods said, Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, having fully awakened to suchness,🔽the Tathāgatas, the Arhats, the Perfectly Enlightened Ones,🔽

original: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i mtshan thob pa'i chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i mtshan thob pa'i chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni 'di yin no //
translated: “Gods, this is the suchness of all phenomena, which the bodhisattva mahāsattvas awaken to and through which they attain the name Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened Buddha.🔽When this chapter on suchness was taught, this great trichiliocosm shook in six ways:

original: de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na; stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu 'gul /🔽rab tu 'gul /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na; stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu 'gul / rab tu 'gul /
translated: it trembled, quivered, and trembled and quivered;🔽it shook, quaked, and shook and quaked;

original: kun tu rab tu 'gul lo //🔽ldeg / rab tu ldeg /🔽kun tu rab tu ldeg go ;g-yos /🔽rab tu g-yos /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu 'gul lo // ldeg / rab tu ldeg / kun tu rab tu ldeg go ;g-yos / rab tu g-yos /
translated: it swayed, rocked, and swayed and rocked;🔽it reeled, lurched, and reeled and lurched;

original: kun tu rab tu g-yos so //🔽shar phyogs mtho na /
analyzed: kun tu rab tu g-yos so // shar phyogs mtho na /
translated: it quaked, trembled, and quaked and trembled;

original: nub phyogs dma'o //🔽nub phyogs mtho na /
analyzed: nub phyogs dma'o // nub phyogs mtho na /
translated: when the east rose, the west sank;

original: shar phyogs dma'o //🔽byang phyogs mtho na /
analyzed: shar phyogs dma'o // byang phyogs mtho na /
translated: when the west rose, the east sank;

original: lho phyogs dma'o //🔽lho phyogs mtho na /
analyzed: lho phyogs dma'o // lho phyogs mtho na /
translated: when the north rose, the south sank;

original: byang phyogs dma'o //
analyzed: byang phyogs dma'o //
translated: when the south rose, the north sank;🔽and when the perimeter rose, the center sank.

original: mtha' mtho na /
analyzed: mtha' mtho na /
translated: If the ends are high,🔽the middle is low.

original: dbus dma'o // dbus mtho na /
analyzed: dbus dma'o // dbus mtho na /
translated: If the middle is high,🔽the ends are low.

original: mtha' dma'o // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dag dang / lha'i rgya spos dang / shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag dang / lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
analyzed: mtha' dma'o // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dag dang / lha'i rgya spos dang / shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag dang / lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
translated: Then the gods of the desire realm and the gods of the form realm at that time scattered divine sandalwood powder, divine incense, divine tamala leaf powder, divine utpala flowers,

original: padma dang / ku mu ta dang / padma dkar po dag gis bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor /🔽mngon par gtor /
analyzed: padma dang / ku mu ta dang / padma dkar po dag gis bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor / mngon par gtor /
translated: padma flowers, kumuta flowers, and white padma flowers over the Lord Shakyamuni and the elder Subhuti.🔽They scattered them,

original: mngon par rab tu gtor nas /
analyzed: mngon par rab tu gtor nas /
translated: they scattered them well,

original: tshig 'di skad ces gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so zhes smras so //
analyzed: tshig 'di skad ces gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so zhes smras so //
translated: and they said, It is wonderful that this elder Subhuti has been born in the Tathagata's suchness and after the Tathagata.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste /
translated: Then the venerable Subhuti, taking up the continuity of that conversation,🔽said to those gods,

original: lha de dag la @251b 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: lha de dag la @251b 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: He said to those gods,

original: lha dag / de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: lha dag / de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: “Gods, it is like this: The elder Subhūti has not arisen following form,

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: has not arisen following the suchness of form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes /
translated: has not arisen following feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: has not arisen following the suchness of consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyis rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyis rjes su ma skyes /
translated: has not arisen following anything other than consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: and has not arisen following anything other than the suchness of consciousness.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: In the same way,🔽he has not arisen following , up to and including the knowledge of all aspects,🔽has not arisen following the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: has not arisen following anything other than the knowledge of all aspects,🔽and has not arisen following anything other than the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise in the suchness of omniscience, nor does it arise from it.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes /🔽'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes / 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes /
translated: It does not arise in the suchness of the unconditioned,🔽nor does it arise from it.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyis rjes su ma skyes so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyis rjes su ma skyes so //
translated: It does not arise in the suchness of the unconditioned, nor does it arise from it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: lha dag / 'di ltar gang zhig rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
analyzed: lha dag / 'di ltar gang zhig rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
translated: Because, gods, all those phenomena that would arise, from which they would arise, and where they would arise are non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Śāradvatīputra said to the Blessed One:🔽“Blessed One, this is indeed a great marvel.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid 'di ni zab lags te /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid 'di ni zab lags te /
translated: “Venerable Transcendent Victor, this suchness of all phenomena, unmistaken suchness, establishment of phenomena, and the very nature of phenomena is profound.

original: de la ni gzugs dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @252a *//
analyzed: de la ni gzugs dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @252a *//
translated: In it, form and the knowledge of all aspects

original: nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mi dmigs lags so //
analyzed: nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mi dmigs lags so //
translated: are not apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Transcendent Victor said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāriputra,

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: it is just so.

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid 'di ni zab ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid 'di ni zab ste /
translated: This suchness of all phenomena, unmistaken suchness, establishment of phenomena, and the very nature of phenomena is profound.

original: de la ni gzugs dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la ni gzugs dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: In it, form and the suchness of form are not apprehended.

original: de la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: In it, feeling, discrimination, compositional factors, and consciousness and the suchness of consciousness are not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects and the thusness of the knowledge of all aspects are non-apprehensible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ltar de bzhin nyid la ni re zhig gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: 'di ltar de bzhin nyid la ni re zhig gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: it is because, in the thusness of physical forms, physical forms are non-apprehensible.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta ga la dmigs /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta ga la dmigs /
translated: How then could the thusness of physical forms be apprehended?

original: de bzhin du 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na /
translated: Similarly, in the thusness of feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness, consciousness is non-apprehensible.

original: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta ga la dmigs /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta ga la dmigs /
translated: How then could the thusness of consciousness be apprehended?

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽re zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang mi dmigs na /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te / re zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang mi dmigs na /
translated: In the same vein,🔽in the thusness of , up to and including omniscience, omniscience is non-apprehensible.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta ga la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta ga la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: How then could the thusness of omniscience be apprehended?

original: de bzhin nyid 'di bshad pa na /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid 'di bshad pa na /
translated: When this thusness was explained,

original: dge slong khri nyis stong ni /
analyzed: dge slong khri nyis stong ni /
translated: twelve thousand monks

original: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
analyzed: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
translated: their minds were liberated from defilements without grasping.

original: dge slong ma lnga brgya ni /
analyzed: dge slong ma lnga brgya ni /
translated: Five hundred nuns

original: chos rnams la chos kyi @252b mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so //
analyzed: chos rnams la chos kyi @252b mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so //
translated: gave rise to the Dharma eye, which is free from dust and stainless.

original: lha dang mi lnga stong gis ni /
analyzed: lha dang mi lnga stong gis ni /
translated: Five thousand gods and humans

original: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
translated: attained acceptance of the nonarising of dharmas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug cu ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug cu ni /
translated: Sixty bodhisattva mahāsattvas

original: len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
analyzed: len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
translated: were liberated from defilements without grasping.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Bhagavān said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas shing /
translated: those bodhisattva mahāsattvas have served five hundred buddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la dbul ba dag phul te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la dbul ba dag phul te /
translated: have made offerings to all those tathāgatas,

original: de dag las rab tu byung nas /
analyzed: de dag las rab tu byung nas /
translated: have gone forth in their teachings,

original: tshul khrims bsrungs /
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrungs /
translated: have guarded morality,

original: bzod pa bskyed /
analyzed: bzod pa bskyed /
translated: have developed patience,

original: brtson 'grus brtsams /
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams /
translated: they have undertaken perseverance,

original: bsam gtan dag bsgrubs mod kyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan dag bsgrubs mod kyi /
translated: and they have accomplished the meditative stabilities,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /
analyzed: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /
translated: but those bodhisattva great beings are not embraced by the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: and are devoid of skill in means.

original: 'du shes sna tshogs pa nyid dang / spyod pa tha dad pa nyid du gyur te /
analyzed: 'du shes sna tshogs pa nyid dang / spyod pa tha dad pa nyid du gyur te /
translated: They have various perceptions and different practices.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: They are

original: 'di lta ste /🔽'di ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste / 'di ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: as follows:🔽‘This is generosity,

original: de bzhin du sbyin bdag dang / 'di ni slong ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyin bdag dang / 'di ni slong ba'o //
translated: and this is the one who gives, and this is the one who receives.

original: 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o //
translated: It is like this that one should give.

original: 'di la ni sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni sbyin par bya'o //
translated: One should give to this one.

original: de bzhin du 'di ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di ni tshul khrims so //
translated: Similarly, this is moral discipline,

original: bdag cag ni 'di ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag cag ni 'di ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o //
translated: we are endowed with moral discipline like this,

original: tshul khrims ni 'di ltar bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims ni 'di ltar bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: moral discipline should be guarded like this.

original: de bzhin du 'di ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di ni bzod pa'o //
translated: Similarly, this is patience,

original: bdag cag ni 'di ltar bzod pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag cag ni 'di ltar bzod pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: we are endowed with patience like this,

original: 'di ltar bzod pa 'di bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bzod pa 'di bskyed par bya'o //
translated: patience should be generated like this.

original: de bzhin du 'di ni @253a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di ni @253a *//
translated: Likewise, this is🔽

original: brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus so //
translated: In the same way, these are the perfections of perseverance,

original: bdag cag ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o //🔽'di ltar brtson 'grus 'di brtsam par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag cag ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o // 'di ltar brtson 'grus 'di brtsam par bya'o //
translated: these are the perfections of meditative stability,

original: de bzhin du 'di dag ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di dag ni bsam gtan no //
translated: and these are the perfections of wisdom.

original: bdag cag ni 'di ltar bsam gtan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag cag ni 'di ltar bsam gtan pa'o //
translated: We are endowed with such perseverance,🔽we will undertake such perseverance,

original: 'di ltar bsam gtan 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du de lta bu'i 'du shes can dag tu gyur to //
analyzed: 'di ltar bsam gtan 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du de lta bu'i 'du shes can dag tu gyur to //
translated: and we will enter into such meditative stabilities.🔽’ In this way, they have not been assisted by the perfection of wisdom and have not been assisted by skillful means.

original: de dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin par sbyin bdag byin /
analyzed: de dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin par sbyin bdag byin /
translated: They have given gifts,

original: tshul khrims dag bsrungs /🔽bzod pa dag bskyed /
analyzed: tshul khrims dag bsrungs / bzod pa dag bskyed /
translated: they have guarded their morality,🔽they have cultivated patience,

original: brtson 'grus dag brtsams /
analyzed: brtson 'grus dag brtsams /
translated: they have undertaken perseverance,

original: bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: and they have entered into meditative stabilities.

original: de dag gis ni 'du shes tha dad pa nyid med pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes tha dad pa nyid med pa ma thob pas /
analyzed: de dag gis ni 'du shes tha dad pa nyid med pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes tha dad pa nyid med pa ma thob pas /
translated: They have not attained the absence of the discrimination of different perceptions, by which they would enter into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs kyi /
analyzed: de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs kyi /
translated: They have not entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob nas /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob nas /
translated: They have attained the result of stream enterer,

original: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: and similarly, up to they have attained the state of a worthy one.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de'ang yod /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de'ang yod /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, although there is the emptiness gate to liberation, which is the bodhisattva great beings’ path to awakening,

original: mtshan ma med pa'ang yod /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'ang yod /
translated: and there is the signless,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'ang yod mod kyi /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'ang yod mod kyi /
translated: and there is the wishless gate to liberation,

original: 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: nevertheless, because they are not assisted by the perfection of wisdom and are devoid of skillful means,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum @253b du byas nas /🔽nyan thos sam /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum @253b du byas nas / nyan thos sam /
translated: Having actualized the very limit of reality,🔽they become śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
translated: or pratyekabuddhas.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Śāradvatī­putra then asked him,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Reverend Lord!

original: ci'i slad du nyan thos sam /
analyzed: ci'i slad du nyan thos sam /
translated: Why is it that persons belonging to the vehicle of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /
translated: or the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas, while cultivating those very dharmas of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, are not embraced by the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs la mkhas pa dang bral te /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa dang bral te /
translated: and are devoid of skillful means,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas /
translated: having actualized the very limit of reality,

original: nyan thos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos sam /
translated: become śrāvakas🔽or pratyekabuddhas?

original: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom du bas kyang /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom du bas kyang /
translated: but a bodhisattva mahāsattva, while meditating on those dharmas that are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing /
translated: is assisted by the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs la mkhas pa la brten te /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa la brten te /
translated: and relying on skillful means,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas /
translated: having manifested the very limit of reality,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags /
translated: attains the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.”🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra having said that, the Lord said to him,

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la gang zag kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'di la gang zag kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: Here, some people, who are devoid of the mind of omniscience,🔽who are not embraced by the perfection of wisdom, and who are devoid of skill in means, meditate on emptiness,

original: smon pa med pa'i chos de dag sgom na /🔽nyan thos sam /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i chos de dag sgom na / nyan thos sam /
translated: signlessness,🔽and wishlessness.🔽They become śrāvakas or

original: rang @254a *// sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang @254a *// sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
translated: pratyekabuddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas legs par zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la brten te /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas legs par zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la brten te /
translated: here, bodhisattva mahāsattvas, who are not devoid of the mind of omniscience, who are embraced by the perfection of wisdom, and who rely on skill in means,

original: snying rje chen po mngon sum du byas nas /
analyzed: snying rje chen po mngon sum du byas nas /
translated: having actualized great compassion,🔽meditate on emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom na /
translated: signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas /
translated: Having entered into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: they will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽dper na / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang na 'dab chags bya 'dab ma med pa lus dpag tshad brgya pa'am /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / dper na / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang na 'dab chags bya 'dab ma med pa lus dpag tshad brgya pa'am /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig yod par gyur la /
analyzed: dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig yod par gyur la /
translated: it is like this: among the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three there is a bird with no wings, whose body is a hundred leagues or three hundred leagues in size.

original: de'ang de nas dzambu gling 'dir 'ong bar sems te /
analyzed: de'ang de nas dzambu gling 'dir 'ong bar sems te /
translated: It thinks, ‘I will go from there to this Rose Apple Continent.

original: dzambu gling du gnas par bya'o snyam nas /
analyzed: dzambu gling du gnas par bya'o snyam nas /
translated: I will stay in the Rose Apple Continent.’

original: des bdag nyid mchongs la bdag nyid mchongs pa'i 'og tu bar skabs na /
analyzed: des bdag nyid mchongs la bdag nyid mchongs pa'i 'og tu bar skabs na /
translated: It jumps from there, and after it has jumped,

original: de 'di snyam du da ni bdag dzambu gling du ma lhung bar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du da ni bdag dzambu gling du ma lhung bar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na /
translated: in the interim it thinks, ‘Now, without falling to the Rose Apple Continent, I will stay among the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three.’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think?

original: ci bya 'dab ma med pa des slar bdag nyid sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du gzhag par nus snyam mam /🔽gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: ci bya 'dab ma med pa des slar bdag nyid sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du gzhag par nus snyam mam / gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: What do you think, Śāriputra? Will that bird, which has no wings, be able to return to the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three?”

original: ma lags so //
analyzed: ma lags so //
translated: He replied, “No, Venerable Transcendent Victor, it will not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i @254b bu; yang gal te bya 'dab ma med pa de /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i @254b bu; yang gal te bya 'dab ma med pa de /
translated: “Śāriputra, if that bird, which has no wings,

original: de nas lhung bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de nas lhung bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: while falling, thinks,

original: kye ma ma la bdag ma smas ma snad par dzambu gling du gnas par bya'o snyam na /🔽sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: kye ma ma la bdag ma smas ma snad par dzambu gling du gnas par bya'o snyam na / sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: ‘Alas, I will not be injured or harmed when I reach Jambudvīpa,’

original: 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think, Śāriputra?

original: ci bya 'dab ma med pa de ma smas ma snad par dzambu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur snyam mam /🔽gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: ci bya 'dab ma med pa de ma smas ma snad par dzambu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur snyam mam / gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Will that bird, which has no wings, reach Jambudvīpa without being injured or harmed?”

original: ma lags te /🔽de ni smas pa dang / snad pa kho nar dzambu'i gling du lhung zhing 'gum pa'am /
analyzed: ma lags te / de ni smas pa dang / snad pa kho nar dzambu'i gling du lhung zhing 'gum pa'am /
translated: He replied, “No, Venerable Transcendent Victor, it will not.🔽It will fall to Jambudvīpa injured and harmed,

original: 'gum pa la thug pa'i sdug bsngal can du 'gyur lags so //
analyzed: 'gum pa la thug pa'i sdug bsngal can du 'gyur lags so //
translated: and will suffer pain or even die.”

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: bya gang yang rung ba zhig lus che zhing 'dab ma mchis par gyur la /
analyzed: bya gang yang rung ba zhig lus che zhing 'dab ma mchis par gyur la /
translated: if any bird whatsoever has a large body and wings,

original: mthon po zhig nas lhung ba de ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
analyzed: mthon po zhig nas lhung ba de ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
translated: it will fall as it is from a high place.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Transcendent Victor said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: it is just so.

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis bskal pa mang po zhig tu sbyin pa byin zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis bskal pa mang po zhig tu sbyin pa byin zhing /
translated: if a person belonging to the Bodhisattva Vehicle gives gifts for many eons,

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrungs bzod pa bsgoms /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrungs bzod pa bsgoms /
translated: and similarly, guards morality, cultivates patience,

original: brtson 'grus brtsams /
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams /
translated: undertakes perseverance,

original: bsam gtan dag bsgrubs /🔽shes rab bsgoms su zin kyang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dag bsgrubs / shes rab bsgoms su zin kyang /
translated: accomplishes meditative concentrations,🔽and cultivates wisdom,

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /
translated: but is separated from the perfection of wisdom,🔽and

original: thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ches rnams sgom na /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ches rnams sgom na /
translated: If they cultivate emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness without skill in means,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: they will actualize the very limit of reality and fall into the śrāvaka’s awakening or

original: rang sangs rgyas @255a *//🔽kyi sar ltung ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas @255a *// kyi sar ltung ngo //
translated: the pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bas /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bas /
translated: Because those individuals of the Bodhisattva Vehicle are separated from the mind of omniscience.

original: chos de dag bskal pa mang po zhig tu bsgoms shing sbyin pa byin /
analyzed: chos de dag bskal pa mang po zhig tu bsgoms shing sbyin pa byin /
translated: They cultivate those dharmas for many eons, and give gifts.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrungs /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrungs /
translated: Similarly, they guard morality,

original: bzod pa bsgoms /
analyzed: bzod pa bsgoms /
translated: cultivate patience,

original: brtson 'grus brtsams /
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams /
translated: exert vigor,

original: bsam gtan dag bsgrubs /🔽shes rab bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: bsam gtan dag bsgrubs / shes rab bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: practice the meditative concentrations,🔽and cultivate wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba dang / de'i phyir de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba dang / de'i phyir de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: At that time, because they are not assisted by the perfection of wisdom, are separated from skill in means, and are not assisted by the perfection of meditative concentration, they will actualize the very limit of reality and fall into the śrāvaka’s awakening or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //
translated: they will fall to the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul khrims dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul khrims dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,🔽further, those persons of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who think about the meditative stabilization, morality, wisdom, liberation,

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de dag sems shing mtshan mar 'dzin la /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de dag sems shing mtshan mar 'dzin la /
translated: and knowledge and seeing of liberation of the past, future, and present lord buddhas,

original: kun tu 'dzin te /
analyzed: kun tu 'dzin te /
translated: and who apprehend and hold on to them as signs,

original: sgom mod kyi /
analyzed: sgom mod kyi /
translated: and who cultivate them,

original: 'on kyang des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyogs tsam yang mi shes so //
analyzed: 'on kyang des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyogs tsam yang mi shes so //
translated: but who do not know even a fraction of the tathāgatas’ morality,

original: de bzhin du des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phyogs tsam yang mi shes la /
analyzed: de bzhin du des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phyogs tsam yang mi shes la /
translated: and who do not know even a fraction of the tathāgatas’ liberation and knowledge and seeing of liberation,

original: de'ang mi shes mi mthong bzhin du byang chub kyi lam stong pa nyid de dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag /
analyzed: de'ang mi shes mi mthong bzhin du byang chub kyi lam stong pa nyid de dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag /
translated: but without understanding or seeing them.

original: @255b gi sgra nyan par byed do //🔽des sgra de yid la byas nas /
analyzed: @255b gi sgra nyan par byed do // des sgra de yid la byas nas /
translated: They pay attention to those sounds

original: mtshan mar 'dzin to //
analyzed: mtshan mar 'dzin to //
translated: and grasp at signs.

original: mtshan mar bzung nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de /
analyzed: mtshan mar bzung nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de /
translated: And having grasped at signs, they dedicate that to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ltar yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Those individuals who are followers of the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who make a dedication like that will stand on the level of the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: or stand on the level of the pratyekabuddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba de ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba de ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because those who are not embraced by the perfection of wisdom and are devoid of skillful means will be like that.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pa dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pa dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed /
translated: Here, bodhisattva great beings, from the first production of the thought of awakening onward, never separate from the thought of awakening to complete knowing, and they give gifts,

original: tshul khrims srung /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung /
translated: guard morality,

original: bzod pa skyed /
analyzed: bzod pa skyed /
translated: produce patience,

original: brtson 'grus rtsom /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom /
translated: exert effort,

original: bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang /
translated: and become absorbed in meditative stabilization.🔽They do not apprehend the morality, meditative stabilization, wisdom,

original: rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa de mtshan mar mi 'dzin la /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa de mtshan mar mi 'dzin la /
translated: liberation, or knowledge and seeing of liberation of past, future, or present lord buddhas as a causal sign.

original: de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan mar mi 'dzin /
analyzed: de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan mar mi 'dzin /
translated: They do not apprehend the meditative stabilization of emptiness as a causal sign.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtshan mar mi 'dzin te /🔽de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @256a *//
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtshan mar mi 'dzin te / de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @256a *//
translated: He does not apprehend the sign of the concentration of wishlessness.

original: byang chub dang nye ba yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub dang nye ba yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: He should know that he is close to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /
translated: It is because that bodhisattva great being

original: sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: from the first production of the thought of awakening onward has given gifts without apprehending a sign,

original: tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: has guarded morality without apprehending a sign,

original: bzod pa bskyed kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: bzod pa bskyed kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: has generated patience without apprehending a sign,🔽has made an effort at perseverance without apprehending a sign,

original: brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: has become absorbed in concentration without apprehending a sign,

original: shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung la /
analyzed: shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung la /
translated: and has cultivated wisdom without apprehending a sign.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung ba'i phyir te /
translated: The past, future, and present Bhagavān Buddhas also do not apprehend morality, samādhi, wisdom, liberation, or the vision of the wisdom of liberation as signs.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong /
analyzed: gang mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong /
translated: those who give gifts with a mind free from signs,

original: tshul khrims srung /🔽bzod pa skyed /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung / bzod pa skyed /
translated: guard morality,🔽generate patience,

original: brtson 'grus rtsom /🔽bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa nas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom / bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa nas /
translated: exert vigor,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa 'di ni /
translated: enter into the meditative stabilities, and practice up to the knowledge of all aspects

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yin no //
translated: are the skillful means of bodhisattva great beings.

original: gsol pa / bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal pa ltar na /
analyzed: gsol pa / bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal pa ltar na /
translated: ” He said, “According to my understanding of the meaning of what the Bhagavān has said,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed phyin chad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @256b thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed phyin chad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @256b thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma mchis lags so //
translated: The unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment of the bodhisattva great beings who, from the first production of the thought of awakening onward, are not separated from the perfection of wisdom and skillful means is without doubt.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed slan chad 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed slan chad 'di lta ste /
translated: it is because the bodhisattva great beings, from the first production of the thought of awakening onward, do not engage in the practice of the perfection of wisdom and skillful means in order to perfect form,🔽feeling,

original: gzugs sam / tshor ba'am /
analyzed: gzugs sam / tshor ba'am /
translated: perception,🔽volitional factors,

original: 'du shes sam /🔽'du byed rnams sam /🔽rnam par shes pa nas /
analyzed: 'du shes sam /🔽'du byed rnams sam /🔽rnam par shes pa nas /
translated: or consciousness,🔽up to

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos ni nam yang ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos ni nam yang ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o //
translated: up to and including the knowledge of all aspects, is never apprehended, namely, that which is fully awakened to, that by which it is fully awakened to, and that in which it is fully awakened to.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,🔽the unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening of those sons of good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so //
translated: daughters of good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom and skill in means should be known without doubt.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag gis sbyin pa gang dang gang btang ba mtshan mar ma bzung /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag gis sbyin pa gang dang gang btang ba mtshan mar ma bzung /
translated: In this way, those who are not separated from the perfection of wisdom and skill in means, whatever generosity they give, they do not apprehend it as a sign.
