original: de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs pa de mtshan mar ma bzung bzod pa gang dang gang bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang dang gang brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang gang dag la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / shes rab gang dang gang bsgoms pa de @257a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs pa de mtshan mar ma bzung bzod pa gang dang gang bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang dang gang brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang gang dag la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / shes rab gang dang gang bsgoms pa de @257a *//
translated: Similarly, whatever morality they guard, they do not apprehend it as a sign; whatever patience they accomplish, whatever effort they undertake, whatever concentrations they rest in, and whatever wisdom they cultivate,

original: mtshan mar ma bzung ba'i slad du ste /
analyzed: mtshan mar ma bzung ba'i slad du ste /
translated: they do not apprehend it as a sign.

original: de lta lags pas rgyu des na /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de lta lags pas rgyu des na / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: For that reason,🔽the unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment of those sons of good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi lags so //
translated: daughters of good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas should be known without doubt.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: de lta lags pas na /
analyzed: de lta lags pas na /
translated: for that reason,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pas /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who, with an altruistic mind,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas /
translated: wish to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bar bgyi'o //
translated: should not be separated from the perfection of wisdom and should not be separated from skill in means.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la gnas nas mi dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtang bar bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la gnas nas mi dmigs pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtang bar bgyi /
translated: Having stood in the perfection of wisdom and skill in means, they should give gifts with a mind that is not observed, that has no signs, and that has no focal point.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi /🔽bzod ba bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi / bzod ba bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: Similarly, they should guard morality,🔽they should cultivate patience,

original: brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi /
translated: they should make an effort at perseverance,

original: bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
translated: they should become absorbed in concentrations,

original: shes rab bsgom par bgyi zhing /
analyzed: shes rab bsgom par bgyi zhing /
translated: and they should cultivate wisdom.

original: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And similarly, in the same way as above,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyad par bgyi lags so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyad par bgyi lags so //
translated: they should practice up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the gods of the desire realm and the gods of the form realm said to the Blessed One:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Venerable Blessed One,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par @257b 'byung dga' ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par @257b 'byung dga' ste /
translated: unsurpassed perfect complete awakening is difficult to manifest.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang bgyi 'tshal la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang bgyi 'tshal la /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas should fully and completely awaken to all dharmas without exception.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: chos de dag thams cad kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so //
analyzed: chos de dag thams cad kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so //
translated: it is amazing that all those dharmas do not exist and are not apprehended.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: lha dag / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha dag / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Gods, it is so, it is so.

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par 'byung dka' ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par 'byung dka' ste /
translated: Unsurpassed perfect complete awakening is difficult to manifest.

original: lha dag / ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /🔽ngas kyang don dam par gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
analyzed: lha dag / ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / ngas kyang don dam par gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
translated: “Gods, I have also fully awakened to all dharmas in all their aspects.🔽I have also not apprehended any dharma at all in ultimate reality that would fully awaken

original: gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos 'ga' yang ma dmigs so //
analyzed: gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos 'ga' yang ma dmigs so //
translated: or to which one would fully awaken.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: chos thams cad ni 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because all dharmas are empty of the compounded and the uncompounded,

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because they are utterly pure.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du /
translated: when the Lord has said,

original: lha dag / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par 'byung dka'o zhes bka' stsal na /
analyzed: lha dag / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par 'byung dka'o zhes bka' stsal na /
translated: ‘Gods, unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is hard to come by,’

original: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba dang / bdag sems pa ltar na /
analyzed: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba dang / bdag sems pa ltar na /
translated: I understand the meaning of what the Blessed One has said, and as I understand it,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par 'byung sla zhing /🔽mngon par rdzogs @258a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par 'byung sla zhing / mngon par rdzogs @258a *//
translated: it seems to me that unexcelled, perfect, complete awakening is easy to attain.

original: par byang chub par sla ba snyam bgyid lags so //
analyzed: par byang chub par sla ba snyam bgyid lags so //
translated: It seems to me that it is easy to fully awaken to🔽unexcelled, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong la /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong la /
translated: it is because all phenomena are empty of all phenomena.

original: chos gang gis kyang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
analyzed: chos gang gis kyang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste /
translated: No phenomenon can fully awaken to any phenomenon.

original: chos thams cad stong pa la gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa la gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
translated: In the emptiness of all phenomena, there is no phenomenon that can fully awaken,

original: gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
analyzed: gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
translated: there is no one who can fully awaken,

original: gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o //
translated: and there is no phenomenon to which one can fully awaken.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong ste /
translated: it is like this: all phenomena are empty of all phenomena.🔽Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang zhig 'grib pa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang zhig 'grib pa'am /
translated: for what reason do bodhisattva great beings practice generosity,

original: 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa stsol ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom pa dang /
analyzed: 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa stsol ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom pa dang /
translated: and similarly, guard morality, cultivate patience, undertake perseverance, become absorbed in meditative stabilization, cultivate wisdom,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and similarly, connect this with each, up to🔽practice the knowledge of all aspects?

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du ste /
translated: Those phenomena do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung ba sla ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par sla lags so //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung ba sla ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par sla lags so //
translated: For this reason, Blessed One, the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment of bodhisattva great beings is easy to attain and easy to fully awaken to.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe @258b na; btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe @258b na; btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Why is that, Venerable Blessed One?

original: 'di ltar gzugs ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong /
translated: It is because form is empty of inherent nature.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong /
translated: Similarly, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty of inherent nature.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way, connect this with each,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i slad du'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i slad du'o //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects is empty of inherent nature.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then venerable Śāriputra said to venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: rnam grangs de nyid kyis na /
analyzed: rnam grangs de nyid kyis na /
translated: for this very reason

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni shin tu 'byung bar dka' ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par shin tu dka' ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni shin tu 'byung bar dka' ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par shin tu dka' ste /
translated: The unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment of the bodhisattvas is very difficult to attain, and it is very difficult to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: dper na / nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so //
translated: For example, space does not think, ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di snyam du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di snyam du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: in the same way, the bodhisattvas do not think, ‘I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.’ And why?

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: it is because all phenomena are equal to space.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas /
translated: Because bodhisattva great beings, having confidence in all phenomena as being like space,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /🔽gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @259a *//
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @259a *//
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: chen pos chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas /
analyzed: chen pos chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos nas /
translated: if bodhisattva great beings, having confidence in all phenomena as being like space,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar sla zhing mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sla ste /🔽'byung bar dka' ba ma yin /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar sla zhing mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sla ste / 'byung bar dka' ba ma yin /
translated: fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening easily and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening easily,

original: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par dka' ba ma yin na ni /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par dka' ba ma yin na ni /
translated: it is not difficult to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha bgos pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha bgos pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur te /
translated: then bodhisattva great beings girded for the armor as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River would not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: rnam grangs des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni shin tu 'byung bar dka' zhing /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni shin tu 'byung bar dka' zhing /
translated: by this one of many explanations, it is clear that unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is very difficult to come by,

original: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par dka' bar mngon no //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par dka' bar mngon no //
translated: and it is clear that perfect complete buddhahood is difficult.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines,

original: yongs su gzung ba med pa dang / spang ba med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: yongs su gzung ba med pa dang / spang ba med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
translated: this is the twenty-third chapter, “Not Grasping and Not Rejecting.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said this to the Lord:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas gang la gnas par bgyi lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas gang la gnas par bgyi lags /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings want to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, to what should they attend?”🔽When he had said that, the Lord said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: “Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag @259b par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag @259b par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who wish to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa nyid la gnas par bya /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa nyid la gnas par bya /
translated: should abide in impartiality toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should generate an impartial mind toward all sentient beings.

original: snyoms pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas /
analyzed: snyoms pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas /
translated: Having established an impartial mind,

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems kyis gtam 'dre bar bya /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems kyis gtam 'dre bar bya /
translated: they should converse with all sentient beings with a mind of benefit.

original: phebs par smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: phebs par smra bar bya'o //
translated: They should speak straightforwardly.

original: sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should generate great love toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la nga rgyal bskyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la nga rgyal bskyung bar bya'o //
translated: They should reduce pride toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should generate the perception of all sentient beings as teachers.

original: sems can thams cad la snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig gis gtam 'dre bar bya /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig gis gtam 'dre bar bya /
translated: They should converse with all sentient beings with pleasant, gentle words.

original: phebs par smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: phebs par smra bar bya'o //
translated: They should speak straightforwardly.

original: sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: One should arouse a mind free from hostility toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: One should arouse a mind free from contempt toward all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad la pha ma dang / ming sring gi sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la pha ma dang / ming sring gi sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: One should arouse a mind toward all sentient beings as one would toward one’s mother, father, brother, or sister.

original: sems can thams cad la mdza' bshes dang / ne'u zla dang / nye du'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mdza' bshes dang / ne'u zla dang / nye du'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: One should arouse a mind toward all sentient beings as one would toward one’s friends, companions, and relatives.

original: sems can thams cad la pha ma dang / ming sring dang / mdza' bshes dang / ne'u zla dang / nye du'i sems kyis gtam 'dre bar bya /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la pha ma dang / ming sring dang / mdza' bshes dang / ne'u zla dang / nye du'i sems kyis gtam 'dre bar bya /
translated: One should converse with all sentient beings with a mind like that of a mother, father, brother, sister, friend, companion, or relative.

original: phebs par smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: phebs par smra bar bya'o //
translated: One should speak pleasantly.

original: des kyang srog gcod pa spang bar bya /
analyzed: des kyang srog gcod pa spang bar bya /
translated: One should oneself give up killing.

original: gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa spong ba nyid kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang srog gcod pa spong ba nyid kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: One should encourage others to take up the path of giving up killing.

original: rtag tu srog gcod pa spong ba nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rtag tu srog gcod pa spong ba nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: One should always speak in praise of giving up killing.

original: @260a *// gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: @260a *// gzhan gang dag srog gcod pa spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and also praise those others who have given up killing, and rejoice in it.

original: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same way,

original: bdag gis kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spong bar bya /🔽gzhan dag kyang log par lta ba spong ba nyid kyis lam yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /🔽log par lta ba spong ba nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya; gzhan gang dag log par lta ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang log par lta ba'i bar du spong bar bya / gzhan dag kyang log par lta ba spong ba nyid kyis lam yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya / log par lta ba spong ba nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya; gzhan gang dag log par lta ba spong ba de dag gi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I myself should give up wrong views,🔽and I should encourage others to give up wrong views,

original: rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
translated: I should speak in praise of giving up wrong views, and I should speak in praise of others giving up wrong views as well, welcoming it.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas chos de dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas chos de dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who want to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should thus stand in those dharmas,

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
translated: and they should do it in a way that does not apprehend anything.

original: de bzhin du bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag kyang bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
translated: In the same way, I myself should enter into the first concentration,🔽and I should enter into the second concentration,🔽and I should enter into the third concentration,

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
translated: and I should enter into the fourth concentration.

original: gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya zhing /
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya zhing /
translated: I should encourage others to enter into the fourth concentration,

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: and I should speak in praise of the fourth concentration,

original: gzhan gang dag bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bar la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan gang dag bsam gtan bzhi ba'i bar la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
translated: and I should speak in praise of others entering into the fourth concentration as well, welcoming it.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @260b chub la gnas par 'dod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @260b chub la gnas par 'dod pas /
translated: Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings who want to stand in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: chos de dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: chos de dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
translated: should stand in those dharmas,

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
translated: and they should do it by way of not apprehending anything.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug par bya ba nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug par bya ba nas /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should enter into the meditative absorption of loving kindness,

original: gzhan gang dag byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and they should also praise and rejoice in others who enter into the meditative absorption of loving kindness.

original: de bzhin du bdag kyang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sems la snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag kyang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sems la snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
translated: Similarly, they should themselves enter into the meditative absorptions of compassion, joy, and equanimity,

original: gzhan gang dag snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sems kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi sems kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and they should also praise and rejoice in others who enter into the meditative absorptions of compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
analyzed: bdag kyang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing /
translated: I myself will enter into the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite space, the meditative absorption of the sense field of infinite consciousness, the meditative absorption of the sense field of nothing-at-all, and the meditative absorption of the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: gzhan gang dag 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise others who enter into the meditative absorption of the sense field of neither perception nor non-perception, and I will rejoice in them.

original: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I myself will perfect the perfection of generosity.

original: gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin @261a *//
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin @261a *//
translated: I will encourage others to take up the perfection of generosity.

original: pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing /
translated: I will praise the perfection of generosity.

original: gzhan gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and they should praise others who perfect the perfection of generosity, welcoming it.

original: de bzhin du ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par sbyar ba bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par sbyar ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as with the perfection of generosity,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: so too should they apply themselves to the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid bsgom par bya /
translated: Subhūti, similarly, bodhisattva great beings should themselves cultivate the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: gzhan dag kyang nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: they should encourage others to cultivate the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bya /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bya /
translated: they should speak in praise of the cultivation of the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: gzhan gang dag nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and they should speak in praise of others cultivating the emptiness of internal phenomena as well, welcoming it.

original: gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: And so on as above.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The same goes for the emptiness of essential nature up to the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
translated: In the same way, I too should cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya /
translated: I should also encourage others to cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bya /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of cultivating the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: gzhan gang dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /🔽bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bsgom par bya /
analyzed: gzhan gang dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o // de bzhin du sbyar te / bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bsgom par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of others who cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness as well, welcoming it.🔽In the same vein, I should cultivate the noble eightfold path.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam @261b yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i lam @261b yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should also encourage others to cultivate the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and praise the cultivation of the noble eightfold path, and rejoice in it.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: In the same way, I too should enter into the emptiness, signless, and wishless meditative stabilizations.

original: gzhan yang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I too should cause others to take up the emptiness, signless, and wishless meditative stabilizations.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag gi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag gi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I too should praise the emptiness, signless, and wishless meditative stabilizations.

original: gzhan gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: And I too should praise others who enter into the emptiness, signless, and wishless meditative stabilizations, and rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
analyzed: bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug par bya /
translated: I myself should enter into the eight liberations and the nine serial absorptions.

original: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should encourage others to enter into the eight liberations and the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag gi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag gi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I should speak in praise of the eight liberations and the nine serial absorptions.

original: gzhan gang dag rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I should speak in praise of others who enter into the eight liberations and the nine serial absorptions, welcoming it as a good quality.

original: bdag gis kyang de bzhin @262a *//
analyzed: bdag gis kyang de bzhin @262a *//
translated: I myself should enter into the ten universal bases.

original: gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya /
translated: I will perfect the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I will cause others to take up the ten powers, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the ten powers, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: gzhan gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I will praise those other bodhisattvas who are perfecting the ten powers, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, welcoming it.

original: bdag kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa la nye bar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa la nye bar brtag par bya'o //
translated: I will also investigate the twelve links of dependent origination in forward and reverse order.

original: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa la nye bar rtog pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa la nye bar rtog pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: Moreover, they should praise the contemplation of the twelve links of dependent origination in forward and reverse progressions.

original: yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: They should encourage others to take up this contemplation.

original: gzhan gang dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dag la nye bar rtog par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan gang dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dag la nye bar rtog par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
translated: They should praise and rejoice in others who contemplate the twelve links of dependent origination in forward and reverse progressions.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar @262b 'dod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar @262b 'dod pas /
translated: Subhūti, in this way, bodhisattva great beings who wish to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: chos 'di dag la de ltar bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: chos 'di dag la de ltar bsgom par bya ste /
translated: should meditate on these phenomena.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
translated: And they should do so without apprehending anything.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis kyang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par bya /🔽sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa spang bar bya /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis kyang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par bya / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa spang bar bya /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should themselves know the noble truth of suffering,🔽abandon the noble truth of the origin of suffering,

original: sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon sum du bya /
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon sum du bya /
translated: actualize the noble truth of the cessation of suffering,

original: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and cultivate the noble truth of the path that leads to the cessation of suffering.

original: gzhan yang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba dang / kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba dang / lam bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba dang / kun 'byung ba spang bar bya ba dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba dang / lam bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: They should also encourage others to know suffering, abandon its origin, actualize its cessation, and cultivate the path that leads to its cessation.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: They should speak in praise of the four noble truths,

original: gzhan gang dag sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa spong ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon sum du byed pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa sgom par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa spong ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon sum du byed pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa sgom par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: And I will praise and rejoice in those who understand the noble truth of suffering, who abandon the noble truth of the arising of suffering, who actualize the noble truth of the cessation of suffering, and who cultivate the noble truth of the path that leads to the cessation of suffering.

original: bdag gis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya ste /
translated: “I will also generate the knowledge that actualizes the fruit of stream enterer.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon sum du mi bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon sum du mi bya'o //
translated: But I will not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /🔽rgyun du @263a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya / rgyun du @263a *//
translated: I will also encourage others to take up the actualization of the fruit of stream enterer.

original: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the actualization of the fruit of stream enterer.

original: gzhan gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa skyed par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //🔽ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skabs su sbyar ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzhan gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa skyed par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o // ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skabs su sbyar ba de bzhin du /
translated: I will also praise and rejoice in those who generate the cognition that manifests the fruit of stream-entry.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Just as in the case of the fruit of stream-entry, so too should you apply this to the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, and up to the fruit of arhatship.

original: bdag gis kyang rang byang chub mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rang byang chub mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa bskyed par bya ste /
translated: I will also generate the cognition that manifests individual enlightenment.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon sum du mi bya'o //🔽gzhan yang rang byang chub mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon sum du mi bya'o // gzhan yang rang byang chub mngon sum du bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: But I will not manifest the very limit of reality.🔽I will also encourage others to take up the manifestation of individual enlightenment.

original: rang byang chub mngon sum du bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: rang byang chub mngon sum du bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: I will praise the manifestation of individual enlightenment.

original: gzhan gang dag rang byang chub mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa skyed par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag rang byang chub mngon sum du bya ba'i shes pa skyed par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and also praise the production of the knowledge which causes others to realize Pratyekabuddhahood, and rejoice in it.

original: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya /
analyzed: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par bya /
translated: I myself should enter into the secure state of a Bodhisattva;

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should cause others to take up the secure state of a Bodhisattva;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bya /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bya /
translated: I should praise the entry into the secure state of a Bodhisattva;

original: gzhan gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and I should rejoice in those who enter into the secure state of a Bodhisattva.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems @263b dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems @263b dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas /
translated: Subhuti, in this way a Bodhisattva-Mahasattva who wishes to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment

original: chos 'di dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: chos 'di dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
translated: should abide in these dharmas.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
translated: and that also without apprehending anything.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya zhing /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should themselves bring beings to maturity,

original: gzhan gang dag sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i bar du byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i bar du byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and they should also praise others who bring beings to maturity, welcoming it.

original: bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su dag par bya zhing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su dag par bya zhing /
translated: They should themselves purify a buddhafield,

original: gzhan gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su dag par byed pa'i bar du byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su dag par byed pa'i bar du byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and they should also praise others who purify a buddhafield, welcoming it.

original: bdag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed par bya zhing /
translated: They should themselves produce the clairvoyances of bodhisattvas,

original: gzhan gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes bskyed pa'i bar du byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes bskyed pa'i bar du byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: I should also praise and rejoice in those who are generating the superknowledges of the bodhisattvas.

original: bdag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bar bya zhing /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bar bya zhing /
translated: I should also fully awaken to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gzhan gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //🔽bdag gis kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya /🔽gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad @264a *//
analyzed: gzhan gang dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o // bdag gis kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya / gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad @264a *//
translated: I should also praise and rejoice in those who are fully awakening to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽I should also abandon all the latent tendencies and afflictions.

original: spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: spong ba yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: I should also encourage others to abandon all the latent tendencies and afflictions.

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bya /
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i bsngags pa'ang brjod par bya /
translated: and the praise of the abandonment of all afflictive emotions and the latent tendencies.

original: gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: And they should also praise and rejoice in the abandonment of all afflictive emotions and the latent tendencies.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas chos 'di dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas chos 'di dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
translated: Subhūti, in this way, Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas who wish to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should abide in these dharmas,

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o ////
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o ////
translated: and they should do so by way of not apprehending anything.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
translated: Noble Mahāyāna Sūtra of the Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyi shu bzhi pa /
analyzed: bam po nyi shu bzhi pa /
translated: Fascicle Twenty-Four

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis kyang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su gzung bar bya /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis kyang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su gzung bar bya /
translated: Subhūti, moreover, Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas should also take up the perfection of lifespan,

original: gzhan yang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
analyzed: gzhan yang tshe phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
translated: Moreover, they should encourage others to take up the perfect life span,

original: tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
analyzed: tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya /
translated: they should praise the perfect life span,

original: gzhan gang dag tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya'o //
translated: and they should also praise and rejoice in others who take up the perfect life span.

original: bdag gis kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya /🔽gzhan gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'am /
analyzed: bdag gis kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya / gzhan gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'am /
translated: They should turn the wheel of the Dharma themselves,🔽and they should praise and rejoice in others who turn the wheel of the Dharma

original: bskor bar 'gyur ba'i bar de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
analyzed: bskor bar 'gyur ba'i bar de dag gi bsngags pa'ang brjod cing rjes su dga' bar bya ste /
translated: or will turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang @264b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang @264b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'dod pas /
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings who want to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: chos 'di dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: chos 'di dag la de ltar gnas par bya ste /
translated: should stand in these dharmas,

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o //
translated: and they should do so without apprehending anything.”🔽“Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings who want to go forth to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening🔽should stand in these dharmas,🔽and they should do so without apprehending anything.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya zhing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya zhing /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should train in the perfection of wisdom like that.

original: de ltar thabs la mkhas pa la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar thabs la mkhas pa la gnas par bya'o //
translated: They should stand in skillful means like that.

original: de ltar slob pa dang / de ltar gnas pa de'i gzugs sgrib pa med par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar slob pa dang / de ltar gnas pa de'i gzugs sgrib pa med par 'gyur /
translated: The form of those who train like that and stand like that will be unobscured.

original: tshor ba sgrib pa med pa dang / 'du shes sgrib pa med pa dang / 'du byed rnams sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba sgrib pa med pa dang / 'du shes sgrib pa med pa dang / 'du byed rnams sgrib pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Their feelings will be unobscured, their perceptions will be unobscured, their volitional factors will be unobscured, and their consciousness will be unobscured.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein, as before,

original: dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar du sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar du sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: up to the Dharma of the true dharmas will be unobscured.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /
translated: If you ask why, Subhūti, it is because those bodhisattva great beings
