original: byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa 'di bshad pa na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa 'di bshad pa na /
translated: When this stage of the bodhisattvas was explained,

original: byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
translated: twelve thousand bodhisattvas attained the forbearance of the non-production of dharmas.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha mi bdog pa'i sems can dag mthong na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha mi bdog pa'i sems can dag mthong na /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practicing the perfection of generosity see beings who lack food, drink, sustenance, and bedding,

original: 'di snyam du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag gi ser sna las byung ba'i skyon 'di 'dra ba 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag gi ser sna las byung ba'i skyon 'di 'dra ba 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med la /
translated: they should think, ‘When I have attained unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, in that buddha-field, these faults arising from the beings’ stinginess will not occur, will not exist,

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur bar bdag gis 'bad par bya ste /🔽ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag de lta bur 'gyur ba de ltar de srid du /
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur bar bdag gis 'bad par bya ste / ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag de lta bur 'gyur ba de ltar de srid du /
translated: I will strive to make the enjoyments and possessions of the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm, the Trāyastriṃśa realm, the Yāma realm, the Tuṣita realm, the Nirmāṇa­rata realm, and the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realm be like that.

original: bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
translated: In that buddha realm, I will practice the perfection of generosity to the extent that the enjoyments and possessions of those beings will be like that.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @265b chen po de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @265b chen po de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of generosity accordingly

original: myur du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: myur du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: will swiftly perfect the transcendent perfection of generosity.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas srog gcod pa nas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas srog gcod pa nas /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva, a great being who courses in the perfection of morality, should not stand in the morality of a Disciple or a Pratyekabuddha.

original: log par lta ba'i bar rnams dang / tshe thung ba rnams dang / gnod pa mang ba dag dang / mdog ngan pa dag dang / mthu chung ba dag dang / longs spyod chung ba dag dang / rigs ngan du skyes pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag mtshang ba dag dang /
analyzed: log par lta ba'i bar rnams dang / tshe thung ba rnams dang / gnod pa mang ba dag dang / mdog ngan pa dag dang / mthu chung ba dag dang / longs spyod chung ba dag dang / rigs ngan du skyes pa dang / yan lag dang nyid lag mtshang ba dag dang /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality should see that beings have short lives, many afflictions, bad complexions, little strength, few resources, are born in low families, and have defective limbs and digits.

original: skye bo khong dge bas smad pa dag mthong na /
analyzed: skye bo khong dge bas smad pa dag mthong na /
translated: And they should see that beings are despised by the virtuous.

original: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las byung ba'i skyon 'di 'dra ba 'di dag
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las byung ba'i skyon 'di 'dra ba 'di dag
translated: They should think, “Alas! When I have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, in that buddhafield I will practice with that kind of morality so that those beings will not have the faults that arise from immorality.

original: mi 'byung zhing med par 'gyur ba de'i bar du bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /🔽rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: mi 'byung zhing med par 'gyur ba de'i bar du bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste / rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Until I attain the knowledge of all modes, I should practice the perfection of morality.”🔽Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who thus courses in the perfection of morality, quickly fulfills the perfection of morality.🔽He will not be reborn in the states of woe, nor will he be reborn among short-lived beings.🔽He will not be reborn among the Caturmahārājika gods, nor among the Trāyastriṃśa, nor among the Yāma, nor among the Tuṣita, nor among the Nirmāṇarati, nor among the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods.

original: myur du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: myur du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no; ;rab 'byor /
translated: He will not be reborn among the Brahmakāyika gods, nor among the Brahmapurohita, nor among the Brahmapārṣadya, nor among the Parīttābha, nor among the Apramāṇābha, nor among the Ābhāsvara, nor among the Parīttaśubha, nor among the Apramāṇaśubha, nor among the Śubhakṛtsna, nor among the Bṛhatphala gods.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: He will not be reborn among the Avṛha, nor among the Atapa, nor among the Sudarśana, nor among the Sudṛśa, nor among the Akaniṣṭha gods.🔽He will not be reborn among the gods of the realm of form, nor among the gods of the formless realm.🔽He will not be reborn among the gods who are subject to the chance occurrence of ideation, nor among the gods who are not subject to the chance occurrence of ideation.

original: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur bdag dang / lan mang @266a *//
analyzed: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur bdag dang / lan mang @266a *//
translated: He will not be reborn among the gods who are not subject to ideation.🔽He will not be reborn among the gods of the sphere of endless space, nor among the gods of the sphere of endless consciousness, nor among the gods of the sphere of nothingness, nor among the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception.🔽He will not be reborn among the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception.🔽He will not be reborn among the gods of the sphere of endless space, nor among the gods of the sphere of endless consciousness, nor among the gods of the sphere of nothingness, nor among the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception.🔽He will not be reborn among the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor nonperception.🔽He will not be reborn among the gods of the sphere of endless space, nor

original: du khros pa dag dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas snun pas phan tshun gnod sems byed pa dag dang / srog dang 'bral bar byed pa'i sems can dag mthong na 'di snyam du /
analyzed: du khros pa dag dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / bong ba dang / dbyug pa dang / mtshon chas snun pas phan tshun gnod sems byed pa dag dang / srog dang 'bral bar byed pa'i sems can dag mthong na 'di snyam du /
translated: When they see beings who are angry, who have a disturbed state of mind, who harm each other with clods of earth, sticks, and weapons, and who have a mind to kill, they should think:

original: kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: ‘When, having attained supreme enlightenment, in this Buddha-field of mine

original: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi gnod sems las byung ba'i skyon de lta bu 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med pa dang / sems can thams cad kyang /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi gnod sems las byung ba'i skyon de lta bu 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med pa dang / sems can thams cad kyang /
translated: all these faults arising from malice will be non-existent, and all beings will have a mind of love, a mind of kindness, a mind of compassion, a mind of joy, and a mind of equanimity,

original: dper na / 'od gsal gyi lha rnams ltar rtag tu pha ma dang / ming sring lta bu'i sems su byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: dper na / 'od gsal gyi lha rnams ltar rtag tu pha ma dang / ming sring lta bu'i sems su byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
translated: For example, just as the gods of the Abhasvara realm always have a mind of love, like a mother or father or brother or sister, to that extent I should practice the perfection of patience.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice the perfection of patience like that

original: myur du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: myur du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: quickly perfect the perfection of patience.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas le lo can dag dang / mtho ris dang / byang grol la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dag dang / theg pa gsum las lhung ba'i sems can dag mthong na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas le lo can dag dang / mtho ris dang / byang grol la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dag dang / theg pa gsum las lhung ba'i sems can dag mthong na /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva mahāsattvas practicing the perfection of perseverance see lazy people, those averse to the higher realms and liberation, and sentient beings fallen from the three vehicles,

original: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @266b pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @266b pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: He should reflect, “Alas! In my buddhafield, when I have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,

original: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi le lo las byung ba'i skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med la /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi le lo las byung ba'i skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med la /
translated: I will strive in the transcendent perfection of perseverance until such faults arising from the laziness of those sentient beings do not occur and are non-existent.

original: sems can thams cad kyang dge ba dag la brten cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang dge ba dag la brten cing /
translated: All sentient beings will rely upon virtue,

original: nges par legs pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams nas /
analyzed: nges par legs pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams nas /
translated: and having initiated perseverance for the sake of definite goodness,

original: theg pa gsum po gang yang rung bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: theg pa gsum po gang yang rung bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
translated: they will attain nirvāṇa through any of the three vehicles.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of perseverance in that manner

original: myur du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: myur du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: and quickly perfect the perfection of perseverance.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa dag dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang bral ba'i sems can dag mthong na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa dag dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang bral ba'i sems can dag mthong na /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of concentration see beings obscured by the five obscurations, separated from the four concentrations, and separated from the four formless absorptions,

original: 'di snyam du kyi ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kyi ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: they should think, ‘Alas! When I have attained awakening, in my buddhafield

original: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi sgrib pa lnga'i skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med la /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi sgrib pa lnga'i skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med la /
translated: I will practice with perseverance so that these faults of the five obscurations of those beings do not occur and do not exist,

original: sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan par 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis bsam @267a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan par 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis bsam @267a *//
translated: and all beings will be intent on the eight liberations.’

original: gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
translated: I should practice the perfection of concentration for a long time.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of concentration like that

original: myur du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: myur du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //
translated: quickly complete the perfection of concentration.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sems can shes rab 'chal ba dag dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral ba dag dang / sdig pa'i las kun tu spyod pa dag dang / bya ba ma yin pa smra ba dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can shes rab 'chal ba dag dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral ba dag dang / sdig pa'i las kun tu spyod pa dag dang / bya ba ma yin pa smra ba dag mthong na /
translated: see beings with poor wisdom, who are devoid of mundane and transcendent right views, who engage in evil actions, and who speak inappropriately,

original: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: He should reflect in this way: “Alas! In my Buddha-field, when I have attained highest genuine full Awakening,

original: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi gti mug las byung ba'i skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med la /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi gti mug las byung ba'i skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag mi 'byung zhing med la /
translated: these faults of beings that arise from delusion will not occur, will not be found.

original: sems can thams cad kyang rig pa gsum dang ldan par 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang rig pa gsum dang ldan par 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
translated: I will practice the perfection of wisdom until all beings will be endowed with the three knowledges.”

analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /

analyzed: tshogs gsum po 'di lta ste /

analyzed: yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dang / log pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dang / ma nges pa'i tshogs la gnas pa dag mthong na /

analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can de dag tshogs gcig po 'di lta ste /

original: tshogs gzhan gnyis po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: tshogs gzhan gnyis po 'di lta ste /

analyzed: log pa nyid du nges pa'i tshogs dang / ma nges pa'i tshogs kyi sgra'ang grag par mi 'gyur ba de srid du /

analyzed: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the six perfections,

original: bdag po mthong na 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: bdag po mthong na 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /

original: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
translated: I will practice the six perfections until I become the lord and unrivaled master of those sentient beings, except for the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha, the Dharmarāja.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
translated: I will purify a buddhafield.

analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag @270b par bya ste /
translated: I will bring sentient beings to maturity.’

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni /

translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections

analyzed: sems can rnams kyi 'gro ba tha dad pa dag mthong na /

analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /

analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi 'gro ba tha dad pa 'di lta ste /

analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am /

analyzed: dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam /

analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam /

original: lha'i 'jig rten nam /
analyzed: lha'i 'jig rten nam /

analyzed: mi'i 'jig rten med par 'gyur zhing /

original: gzhan du na 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gzhan du na 'di lta ste /
translated: Instead, they will be exclusively as follows:

analyzed: sems can thams cad dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la las gcig par 'gyur ba de srid du /
translated: all sentient beings will be exclusively engaged in the four applications of mindfulness and the noble eightfold path.

original: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
translated: Until that time comes, I will practice the six transcendent perfections,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
translated: and I will also refine the buddhafields.’

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /

analyzed: sems can rnams kyi skye gnas bzhi po 'di lta ste /

analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /

analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi skye gnas gsum po 'di lta ste /

analyzed: sgo nga las skye ba'i skye gnas dang / mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas dang / drod gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas dag med cing /

analyzed: sems can thams cad skye gnas gzhan du rdzus te skye ba 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ba de srid du /

analyzed: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /

analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
translated: I will also bring sentient beings to full maturity.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /

translated: they should think, “Alas! When I fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and become a buddha,🔽I will practice the six perfections until all beings there

analyzed: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections

analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bshang gci dag mthong na /
translated: see the feces and urine of beings,🔽they should think, ‘Alas! When I have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /

analyzed: sems can de dag gi bshang gci dag ye med cing /
translated: and those beings will be without feces and urine.’

original: sems can thams cad kyang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang /

original: sems can 'od dang bral ba rnams mthong na /
analyzed: sems can 'od dang bral ba rnams mthong na /

analyzed: 'di snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /

translated: and he will be close to the knowledge of all modes.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practicing the six perfections

original: sems can rnams kyi zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / dus dang / lo dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / dus dang / lo dag mthong na /
translated: should, when they see the months, half-months, seasons, and years of sentient beings,🔽think like this:

original: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /

original: sems can de dag gi zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo rnams kyi sgra'ang grag par mi 'gyur ba de srid du /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo rnams kyi sgra'ang grag par mi 'gyur ba de srid du /
translated: let alone that sentient beings will have them.’

original: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
translated: I should practice the six perfections,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
translated: purify a Buddha-field,

analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam @272b du nye bar brtag par bya ste zhes bya ba nas /
translated: and bring beings to maturity.🔽And so on up to:

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: “He is close to the knowledge of all modes.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: Moreover, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in the six perfections,

original: sems can tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba dag mthong na /
translated: when he sees beings who are lacking in life,

original: 'di snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'di snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
translated: should thus train in this deep perfection of wisdom, as it has been explained, and he should reflect:🔽“Ah, how should I exert myself so that I may attain supreme enlightenment, and that I may demonstrate Dharma to beings in such a way that, after hearing it, they may be endowed with life, and so on up to:

original: tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: and up to “will become immeasurable life” as before, and up to “will approach the knowledge of all aspects” as before.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections

original: sems can mtshan dang bral ba dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can mtshan dang bral ba dag mthong na /
translated: when they see beings without the major marks

original: 'di snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'di snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
translated: should reflect, ‘Ah!

original: sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: When will I have attained the knowledge of all aspects, and when I have attained it, will have all beings have the thirty-two major marks of a great person,’ and up to ‘will approach the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections🔽see sentient beings who lack wholesome roots.🔽They should reflect, ‘When will I be practicing the bodhisattva way, and having attained perfect buddhahood, see those sentient beings with eyes of a tathāgata,🔽and see that all those sentient beings have wholesome roots,🔽and that through those wholesome roots they will serve the lord buddhas?’🔽They should reflect, ‘When will I be practicing the bodhisattva way, and having attained perfect buddhahood, see those sentient beings with eyes of a tathāgata,🔽and see that all those sentient beings have wholesome roots,🔽and that through those wholesome roots they will serve the lord buddhas?’🔽They should reflect, ‘When will I be practicing the bodhisattva way, and having attained perfect buddhahood, see those sentient beings with eyes of a tathāgata,🔽and see that all those sentient beings have wholesome roots,🔽and that through those wholesome roots they will serve the lord buddhas?’🔽They should reflect, ‘When will I be practicing the bodhisattva way, and having attained perfect buddhahood, see those sentient beings with eyes of a tathāgata,

original: sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba dag mthong na /🔽'di snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba dag mthong na / 'di snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
translated: and see that all those sentient beings have wholesome roots,🔽and that through those wholesome roots they will serve the lord buddhas?’🔽They should reflect, ‘When will I be practicing the bodhisattva way, and having attained perfect buddhahood, see those sentient beings with eyes of a tathāgata,🔽and see that all those sentient beings have wholesome roots,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa @273a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa @273a *//
translated: and that through those wholesome roots they will serve the lord buddhas?’🔽They should reflect, ‘When will I be practicing the bodhisattva way, and having attained perfect buddhahood, see those sentient beings with eyes of a tathāgata,

original: ba thams cad dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: ba thams cad dang ldan zhing /
translated: and see that all those sentient beings have wholesome roots,🔽and that through those wholesome roots they will serve the lord buddhas?’🔽They should reflect, ‘When will I be practicing the bodhisattva way, and having attained perfect buddhahood, see those sentient beings with eyes of a tathāgata,🔽and see that all those sentient beings have wholesome roots,🔽and that through those wholesome roots they will serve the lord buddhas?’

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror byed par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror byed par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: They should reflect, ‘When will I be practicing the bodhisattva way, and having attained perfect buddhahood, see those sentient beings with eyes of a tathāgata,

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: and see

original: sems can nad kyis btab pa rnams mthong na /
analyzed: sems can nad kyis btab pa rnams mthong na /
translated: When they see sentient beings afflicted by disease,

original: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: they should think, ‘Alas! When I have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment, in this buddhafield of mine,

original: sems can de dag gi nad bzhi po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi nad bzhi po 'di lta ste /
translated: these four kinds of disease of sentient beings will not occur, namely,

original: rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dag mi 'byung zhing /🔽gzhan yang nyon mongs pa'i nad gsum po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dag mi 'byung zhing / gzhan yang nyon mongs pa'i nad gsum po 'di lta ste /
translated: those arising from wind, bile, phlegm, and their combination.🔽Moreover, these three kinds of afflictive disease will not occur, namely,

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba de srid du /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba de srid du /
translated: desire, hatred, and ignorance.

original: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
analyzed: bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
translated: Until that is the case, I will practice the six transcendent perfections,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
translated: I will refine the buddhafields,

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
translated: and I will bring sentient beings to full maturity.’

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: and they will also be close to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol @273b tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol @273b tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams mthong na /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams mthong na /
translated: see beings who have set out in the vehicle of the śrāvakas and the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: they should think, ‘Alas! When I have attained supreme perfect enlightenment and become a buddha,

original: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi theg pa gnyis po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi theg pa gnyis po 'di lta ste /
translated: in that buddhafield I will practice the six perfections until, by any means, even the words “two vehicles,”

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra'ang grag par mi 'gyur ba de srid du /🔽bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra'ang grag par mi 'gyur ba de srid du /🔽bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
translated: namely, the vehicle of the śrāvakas and the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas, are not heard.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
translated: I must also purify a Buddha-field.

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
translated: I must also bring beings to maturity.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: I must also approach omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections

original: sems can lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag mthong na /
translated: see beings with excessive pride.🔽They think, ‘Alas! When I have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: in that Buddha-field of mine,🔽I must practice the six perfections

original: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi nga rgyal gyi sgra'ang grag par mi 'gyur ba de srid du /🔽bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can de dag gi nga rgyal gyi sgra'ang grag par mi 'gyur ba de srid du /🔽bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
translated: so that those beings will not even hear the word “pride.”

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
translated: I will also purify a Buddha-field.

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhes bya ba nas /
translated: I will also bring beings to maturity.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar @274a *//🔽gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar @274a *// gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: I will also approach omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas; sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu yod pa dang / 'od chung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu yod pa dag mthong na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas; sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu yod pa dang / 'od chung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu yod pa dag mthong na /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections see that the lifespans of beings are limited, their light is small, and the śrāvaka saṅgha of the lord buddhas is limited,

original: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na /
translated: they should think, ‘Alas! When I have attained awakening and become a perfect buddha, in my buddhafield

original: sems can de dag gi tshe dpag tu med pa dang / 'od dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med par 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi tshe dpag tu med pa dang / 'od dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med par 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
translated: I will practice the six perfections until those sentient beings have immeasurable lifespans, immeasurable radiance, and immeasurable śrāvaka saṅghas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
translated: I will also purify a buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
translated: I will also bring sentient beings to maturity.’

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
translated: … and they will also be close to the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu yod pa mthong na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu yod pa mthong na /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections see a buddhafield that is limited,

original: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na /🔽phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa de snyed bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu @274b 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa de snyed bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu @274b 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya /
translated: One should think, When I have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,🔽I will practice the six transcendent perfections to the same extent as all those who are present in the world systems of the ten directions and as numerous as the sands of the River Ganges,🔽and I will do so in order to attain a single buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par bya /
translated: “I should practice the six perfections until I have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment, and the buddhafields of as many world systems as there are sand particles in the river Ganges throughout the ten directions have become a single buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /🔽rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste / rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni /
translated: I should refine the buddhafield and bring sentient beings to maturity.”🔽Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who practice the six perfections accordingly will swiftly perfect the six perfections,

original: myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
analyzed: myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
translated: and

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and they will also have approached omniscience.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections

original: 'di snyam du kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni yun ring ba'o //🔽kye ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni yun ring ba'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhing /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni yun ring ba'o // kye ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni yun ring ba'o snyam du nye bar brtag par bya zhing /
translated: should reflect, ‘Alas, this saṃsāra is long.🔽Alas, this world system is long.’

original: yang 'di snyam du kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni nam mkha' lta bur mu med pa'o //
analyzed: yang 'di snyam du kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni nam mkha' lta bur mu med pa'o //
translated: And they should also reflect, ‘Alas, this saṃsāra is endless like space.

original: kye ma sems can gyi khams 'di ni nam mkha' ltar mu med pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: kye ma sems can gyi khams 'di ni nam mkha' ltar mu med pa yin mod kyi /
translated: Alas, this world of beings is endless like space.

original: 'di la chos kyi brdas sems can zhe'am /
analyzed: 'di la chos kyi brdas sems can zhe'am /
translated: But apart from the conventional expressions “beings,”

original: 'khor ba zhe'am /
analyzed: 'khor ba zhe'am /
translated: “saṃsāra,”

original: rnam par thar pa zhes tha snyad du 'dogs pa ma gtogs par sems can 'ga' yang 'khor ba med cing /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa zhes tha snyad du 'dogs pa ma gtogs par sems can 'ga' yang 'khor ba med cing /
translated: and “liberation” used as a Dharma convention, there are no beings at all in saṃsāra,🔽no nirvāṇa,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa med la /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa med la /
translated: and

original: sems can 'ga' yang yongs su grol ba med do snyam du tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste /
analyzed: sems can 'ga' yang yongs su grol ba med do snyam du tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste /
translated: and that not a single being is completely liberated.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections in that way

original: myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
analyzed: myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
translated: quickly complete the six perfections

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: and get close to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / @275a *//🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dkon mchog gsum po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / @275a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dkon mchog gsum po 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti,

original: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la dbul ba dag phul zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la dbul ba dag phul zhing /
translated: if some bodhisattva great being lacking the perfection of wisdom were to offer the Three Jewels—that is, the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha—for as many eons as there are sands in the Ganges River,

original: de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag la'ang sbyin pa dag byin na /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag la'ang sbyin pa dag byin na /
translated: and were to give gifts to other beings as well,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam /
analyzed: ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam /
translated: “Do you think, Subhūti, that the bodhisattva great being would generate a lot of merit on that basis?”

original: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: mang lags so //
analyzed: mang lags so //
translated: it would be a lot.

original: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Venerable Sugata,

original: tshad ma mchis lags so //
analyzed: tshad ma mchis lags so //
translated: it would be immeasurable.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: de bas kyang gang zhig ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du byed na /
analyzed: de bas kyang gang zhig ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du byed na /
translated: “Therefore, if someone practices this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught,

original: 'di nyid ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
analyzed: 'di nyid ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
translated: they will generate even more merit than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa 'di ni /
translated: This vehicle of the perfection of wisdom

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa ste /
translated: is the vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: theg pa 'dis de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: theg pa 'dis de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this vehicle leads them to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

translated: A bodhisattva great being who is separated from the perfection of wisdom, for as many eons as there are sands in the Ganges river, and who gives gifts,🔽

analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar bya'o //
translated: In this way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being should never be separated from the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de rnams kyi sngon du 'dren pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: is the forerunner of those dharmas that are the aspects of enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar bya /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar bya /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang zhig gis bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar byas nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: Suppose, Subhūti, that a bodhisattva great being, lacking the perfection of wisdom, were to rejoice in all the wholesome roots of the past, future, and present lord buddhas together with their śrāvaka saṅghas, and then, making it common to all sentient beings, were to dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na; ci de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na; ci de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam mam /
translated: Do you think that person would generate a lot of merit on that basis?”

original: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: mang lags so //
analyzed: mang lags so //
translated: it would be a lot.

original: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Venerable Sugata,

original: tshad ma mchis lags @278a *//
analyzed: tshad ma mchis lags @278a *//
translated: it would be immeasurable.”🔽The Lord said,

original: so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: de bas kyang gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad bstan pa 'di la gnas te /
analyzed: de bas kyang gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad bstan pa 'di la gnas te /
translated: But someone who, having stood in this profound perfection of wisdom as it has been taught,

original: nyi ma gcig tsam yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na /
analyzed: nyi ma gcig tsam yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na /
translated: for just one day rejoices in all those wholesome roots, makes common cause with all beings, and dedicates them to full enlightenment,

original: 'di nyid ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
analyzed: 'di nyid ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
translated: he would produce the greater merit.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because, Subhuti, the perfection of wisdom is the forerunner of all dedications.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, Subhuti, the Bodhisattva, the great being, should train in the skill in the dedication of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las /
translated: From the Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines

original: dang po 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
analyzed: dang po 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
translated: Chapter 1: Introduction

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Blessed One:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: how should bodhisattva mahāsattvas practicing the perfection of wisdom familiarize themselves with the emptiness meditative stabilization?

original: ji ltar stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /🔽ji ltar mtshan ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi / ji ltar mtshan ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they enter into the emptiness meditative stabilization?🔽How should they familiarize themselves with the signlessness meditative stabilization?

original: ji ltar mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /🔽ji ltar @278b smon pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi / ji ltar @278b smon pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they enter into the signlessness meditative stabilization?🔽How should they familiarize themselves with the wishlessness meditative stabilization?

original: ji ltar smon pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar smon pa ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi /
translated: How should they enter into the wishlessness meditative stabilization?

original: ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they become familiar with the four establishments of mindfulness?

original: ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la bsgom par bgyi /🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la bsgom par bgyi / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: How should they cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la ji ltar yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la ji ltar yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: In the same vein, how should they become familiar with , up to and including the noble eightfold path?

original: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la bsgom par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la bsgom par bgyi /
translated: How should they cultivate , up to and including the noble eightfold path?

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la yongs su 'dris par bgyi /
translated: How should they become familiar with , up to and including the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas?

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom par bgyi lags; de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom par bgyi lags; de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One replied to the venerable Su­bhūti as follows:

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: “Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs stong zhes bya bar so sor brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs stong zhes bya bar so sor brtag par bya'o //
translated: should investigate the notion that physical forms are empty.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor brtag par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, they should investigate the notion that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are empty.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar so sor brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar so sor brtag par bya ste /
translated: they should investigate the notion that the world system of desire, the world system of form, and the world system of the formless are empty.

original: @279a *// ci nas kyang so sor rtog pa na /
analyzed: @279a *// ci nas kyang so sor rtog pa na /
translated: In this way, as they investigate,

original: sems rnam par mi g-yeng ba de ltar so sor brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: sems rnam par mi g-yeng ba de ltar so sor brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should investigate the mind in that way, without distraction.

original: sems rnam par ma g-yengs na /
analyzed: sems rnam par ma g-yengs na /
translated: If the mind is not distracted,

original: des chos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des chos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then one will see those phenomena as they are in reality.

original: des chos de dag yang dag par rjes su mthong yang mngon sum du ni mi byed do //
analyzed: des chos de dag yang dag par rjes su mthong yang mngon sum du ni mi byed do //
translated: Even though one sees those phenomena in reality, one does not actualize them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la legs par bslabs pa yin zhing chos gang yang 'phel ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la legs par bslabs pa yin zhing chos gang yang 'phel ba'am /
translated: Subhūti, it is because bodhisattvas have trained well in all phenomena that are empty of their own marks, and they do not increase

original: rnam par gcod par mi byed la /
analyzed: rnam par gcod par mi byed la /
translated: or eliminate any phenomenon,

original: mngon sum du mi byed pa'i bar gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum du mi byed pa'i bar gyi phyir ro //
translated: up to not actualizing them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des don dam par gang zhig mngon sum du byed pa dang / gang gis mngon sum du byed pa dang / gang mngon sum du bya ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar des don dam par gang zhig mngon sum du byed pa dang / gang gis mngon sum du byed pa dang / gang mngon sum du bya ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because they do not see any phenomenon at all in ultimate reality that could be actualized, by which it could be actualized, or that could be actualized.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Reverend Lord!

original: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
analyzed: gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
translated: Since the Lord has said,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad stong pa mngon sum du mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad stong pa mngon sum du mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal na /
translated: ‘Bodhisattva great beings should not actualize the emptiness of all phenomena,’

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Reverend Lord!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la gnas nas /
translated: How do bodhisattva great beings standing in emptiness

original: stong pa nyid ji ltar mngon sum du bgyid lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal @279b pa; rab 'byor /
analyzed: stong pa nyid ji ltar mngon sum du bgyid lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal @279b pa; rab 'byor /
translated: actualize emptiness?”

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing /🔽mngon sum du bya'o snyam du ni mi rtog gi /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing / mngon sum du bya'o snyam du ni mi rtog gi /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings analytically understand emptiness endowed with the most superior attributes,🔽they do not analytically understand it thinking, ‘I will actualize it.’

original: yongs su 'dris par bya'o snyam du so sor rtog la /
analyzed: yongs su 'dris par bya'o snyam du so sor rtog la /
translated: They analytically understand it thinking, ‘I will thoroughly know it.’

original: 'di ni mngon sum du bya ba'i dus ma yin no zhes so sor rtog ste /
analyzed: 'di ni mngon sum du bya ba'i dus ma yin no zhes so sor rtog ste /
translated: “This is not the time to actualize it.”🔽“This is the time to become familiar with it.”

original: 'di ni yongs su 'dris par bya ba'i dus yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do; ;byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mnyam par ma bzhag na'ang dmigs pa dag la sems nye bar gtod de /
analyzed: 'di ni yongs su 'dris par bya ba'i dus yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do; ;byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mnyam par ma bzhag na'ang dmigs pa dag la sems nye bar gtod de /
translated: “Even if the bodhisattva mahāsattva does not rest in equipoise, he should direct his mind to those objects.

original: bar ma dor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las yongs su mi nyams so //
analyzed: bar ma dor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams las yongs su mi nyams so //
translated: In the interim, the bodhisattva mahāsattva does not regress from the dharmas that are the aspects of enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag las kyang yongs su mi nyams la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag las kyang yongs su mi nyams la /
translated: he does not regress from the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: zag pa med pa'ang mngon sum du mi byed do //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'ang mngon sum du mi byed do //
translated: but he does not actualize the uncontaminated state.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i chos rgya chen po rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i chos rgya chen po rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because the bodhisattva mahāsattvas possess such extensive attributes.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the bodhisattva great beings

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la shin tu gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la shin tu gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are well-established in the factors of awakening.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings who practice the perfection of wisdom in that way

original: 'di ni yongs su 'dris par bya ba'i dus yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni yongs su 'dris par bya ba'i dus yin gyi /
translated: know, ‘This is the time to become familiar with,

original: 'di ni mngon sum du bya ba'i dus ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu @280a *//
analyzed: 'di ni mngon sum du bya ba'i dus ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu @280a *//
translated: but not the time to actualize.’

original: shes so // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang 'di snyam du /
analyzed: shes so // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang 'di snyam du /
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings also think,

original: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus yin no //
translated: ‘This is the time for the perfection of generosity,

original: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus yin no //
translated: This is the time for the perfection of morality, this is the time for the perfection of patience, this is the time for the perfection of perseverance, this is the time for the perfection of concentration, this is the time for the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa'i dus yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa'i dus yin no //
translated: This is the time for cultivating the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bsgom pa'i dus yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du bsgom pa'i dus yin no //
translated: This is the time for cultivating up to the noble eightfold path.

original: 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag bsgom pa'i dus yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag bsgom pa'i dus yin no //
translated: This is the time for cultivating the emptiness, signless, and wishless meditative stabilizations.

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa'i dus yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa'i dus yin no //
translated: This is the time to cultivate the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i dus yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i dus yin gyi /
translated: This is the time to cultivate the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'i dus ma yin /
analyzed: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'i dus ma yin /
translated: This is not the time to cultivate the result of stream enterer,

original: 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'i dus dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu bsgom pa dang / rang byang chub bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'i dus dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu bsgom pa dang / rang byang chub bsgom pa'i dus ma yin no snyam du nye bar brtag par bya ste /
translated: this is not the time to cultivate the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, or a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' @280b sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' @280b sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag la yongs su 'dris par byed mod kyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag la yongs su 'dris par byed mod kyi /
translated: They do indeed familiarize themselves with emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon sum du mi byed do //🔽de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon sum du mi byed do // de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: but they do not actualize the limit of reality in phenomena that are empty, signless, and wishless.🔽In the same vein, they do indeed familiarize themselves with the applications of mindfulness, the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, and the seven aspects of enlightenment, up to and including the path,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la 'dris par byed mod kyi; yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon sum du mi byed do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la 'dris par byed mod kyi; yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon sum du mi byed do //
translated: but they do not actualize the limit of reality.

original: rab 'byor / dper na skyes bu la la zhig dpa' ba dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / mdzes pa dang / lta na sdug pa dang / 'phong rtsal gyi las legs par bslabs pa zhig tu gyur la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dper na skyes bu la la zhig dpa' ba dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pa dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / mdzes pa dang / lta na sdug pa dang / 'phong rtsal gyi las legs par bslabs pa zhig tu gyur la /
translated: steadfast, handsome, good-looking, pleasing, well-trained in the arts of archery,

original: des kyang mtshon cha sra ba dag bcangs shing /
analyzed: des kyang mtshon cha sra ba dag bcangs shing /
translated: and who carried a strong bow and arrows,

original: sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi tshar phyin pa /
analyzed: sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi tshar phyin pa /
translated: and who was skilled in the sixty-four arts,

original: bzo'i gnas thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par gyur pa /
analyzed: bzo'i gnas thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par gyur pa /
translated: and who was well-versed in all the crafts,

original: rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad la legs par bslabs pa /
analyzed: rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad la legs par bslabs pa /
