translated: and who was well-trained in the eighteen branches of knowledge,

original: skye bo mang po la dben pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur na /
analyzed: skye bo mang po la dben pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur na /
translated: and who was liked, loved, and pleasing to many people.

original: thams cad la legs par bslabs pa'i phyir dgos pa gang dang gang la rtsams pa thams cad las rnyed pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad la legs par bslabs pa'i phyir dgos pa gang dang gang la rtsams pa thams cad las rnyed pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: Because he was well-trained in everything, he would obtain great wealth from whatever occupation he undertook.

original: de'i tshe'ang skye bo mang pos bla mar byed /🔽ri mor byed /
analyzed: de'i tshe'ang skye bo mang pos bla mar byed / ri mor byed /
translated: At that time, he would be respected by many people.🔽He would be honored.

original: mchod pa @281a *//
analyzed: mchod pa @281a *//
translated: He would be worshipped.

original: byed la phyir zhing yi rang ste /
analyzed: byed la phyir zhing yi rang ste /
translated: and rejoice in their actions.

original: dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa de /
analyzed: dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa de /
translated: They are filled with joy, supreme joy, and mental pleasure.

original: dgos pa zhig gi phyir pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bu smad rnams khrid de 'brog dgon pa byis pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa spu zing zhes byed pa zhig tu song la /
analyzed: dgos pa zhig gi phyir pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bu smad rnams khrid de 'brog dgon pa byis pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa spu zing zhes byed pa zhig tu song la /
translated: For some reason, they lead their parents, siblings, wives, sons, daughters, and grandchildren into a wilderness that terrifies children and makes their hair stand on end.

original: der song nas kyang pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bu smad de dag la ma 'jigs shig /
analyzed: der song nas kyang pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bu smad de dag la ma 'jigs shig /
translated: Having gone there, they say to their parents, siblings, wives, sons, daughters, and grandchildren, “Do not be afraid.

original: kho bos khyed 'jigs shing skrag pa chen po 'di las bde legs dang / bde bar 'bros su gzhug cing myur du thar bar bya'o zhes bsgo la /
analyzed: kho bos khyed 'jigs shing skrag pa chen po 'di las bde legs dang / bde bar 'bros su gzhug cing myur du thar bar bya'o zhes bsgo la /
translated: I will lead you to safety and quickly free you from this great fear and terror.”

original: 'brog dgon pa der yang de dag gi dgra bo dang / gsod pa dang / phyir rgol ba mang po dag cig byung bar gyur la /
analyzed: 'brog dgon pa der yang de dag gi dgra bo dang / gsod pa dang / phyir rgol ba mang po dag cig byung bar gyur la /
translated: But in that wilderness, many enemies, murderers, and adversaries appear to them.

original: de'ang shes rab kyi stobs mchog dang ldan pa yin pas /🔽des pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bu smad rnams 'brog dgon pa de nas bde legs dang / bde bar bton nas; slar grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du zhugs nas dga' ba dang /
analyzed: de'ang shes rab kyi stobs mchog dang ldan pa yin pas / des pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / bu smad rnams 'brog dgon pa de nas bde legs dang / bde bar bton nas; slar grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du zhugs nas dga' ba dang /
translated: He is endowed with the power of supreme wisdom.🔽He will safely and happily lead his parents, brothers, sisters, wives, sons, daughters, and grandchildren out of the wilderness.

original: yid bde ba skyes la /
analyzed: yid bde ba skyes la /
translated: He will lead them to a town, city, or village, and they will be delighted and happy.

original: ma snad ma smas par byed cing /
analyzed: ma snad ma smas par byed cing /
translated: He will make sure that they are not injured or hurt.

original: sems can de dag la phyir rgol ba'i sems sam; sems 'khrug par yang mi byed do //
analyzed: sems can de dag la phyir rgol ba'i sems sam; sems 'khrug par yang mi byed do //
translated: He will not let them have any thoughts of opposition or disturbance.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar skyes bu des 'phong gi las dang / de las gzhan pa'i dgos pa thams cad la shin tu byang @281b bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar skyes bu des 'phong gi las dang / de las gzhan pa'i dgos pa thams cad la shin tu byang @281b bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because that man has thoroughly mastered the art of archery and all other necessary skills.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas te /🔽bsgrubs nas gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bar skabs de na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas te / bsgrubs nas gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bar skabs de na /
translated: endowed with equanimity,🔽has pervaded and🔽abides, then,🔽Subhūti, at that time the bodhisattva great being, abiding in the four immeasurables,

original: tshad med pa bzhi la gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: perfects the six perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
translated: Having perfected the six perfections,🔽without having to put up with the destruction of the outflows,

original: zag pa zad par ma gyur pa kho nar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed la /
analyzed: zag pa zad par ma gyur pa kho nar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed la /
translated: he familiarizes himself with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med la gnas nas kyang de dag gi dbang du mi 'gro /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med la gnas nas kyang de dag gi dbang du mi 'gro /
translated: Abiding in emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, he is not carried away by them,

original: de dag gis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag gis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: and they do not steal him away.

original: gang mngon sum du byas pas nyan thos sam /
analyzed: gang mngon sum du byas pas nyan thos sam /
translated: It is the direct realization of which causes the sravakas and pratyekabuddhas to enter into the cessation of discriminations and feelings.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo de dag mngon sum du'ang mi byed do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo de dag mngon sum du'ang mi byed do //
translated: He does not actualize those doors of liberation by actualizing which he would fall into the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rab 'byor / dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is just as🔽a bird flies through the air,

original: 'dab chags bya ni bar snang la rgyu'ang sa la mi ltung zhing /
analyzed: 'dab chags bya ni bar snang la rgyu'ang sa la mi ltung zhing /
translated: but does not fall to the ground,

original: nam mkha' la rgyu ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' la rgyu ste /
translated: and although it flies in the sky,

original: der yang mi gnas la /
analyzed: der yang mi gnas la /
translated: it does not stand there,

original: gos par 'gyur ba'ang med do //
analyzed: gos par 'gyur ba'ang med do //
translated: and it does not get wet.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la 'dris par byed cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la 'dris par byed cing /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, bodhisattva great beings familiarize with the doors of liberation—emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness—

original: de dag la'ang gnas la /
analyzed: de dag la'ang gnas la /
translated: and they stand in them,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi @282a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi @282a *//
translated: but they do not actualize the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ma rdzogs par gang mngon sum du byas na nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ma rdzogs par gang mngon sum du byas na nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and not actualize the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation, which would be the direct realization that would cause them to fall to the śrāvaka level or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon sum du mi byed do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon sum du mi byed do //
translated: the pratyekabuddha level, before they have completed the knowledge of paths.

original: rab 'byor / dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is just as follows:

original: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa 'phong gi bslab pa la legs par bslabs pa la des mda' gnam rgyang du 'phangs la /
analyzed: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa 'phong gi bslab pa la legs par bslabs pa la des mda' gnam rgyang du 'phangs la /
translated: a strong man, well trained in archery, shoots an arrow into the sky,

original: gnam rgyang du 'phangs nas /
analyzed: gnam rgyang du 'phangs nas /
translated: and after he has shot the arrow into the sky,

original: mda' de las gzhan dag gis mda' snga ma de'i phyi bzhin du brgyud de /
analyzed: mda' de las gzhan dag gis mda' snga ma de'i phyi bzhin du brgyud de /
translated: he shoots other arrows after the first arrow,

original: de ji srid du 'dod pa de srid du mda' de sa la ltung du mi ster la /
analyzed: de ji srid du 'dod pa de srid du mda' de sa la ltung du mi ster la /
translated: As long as he wishes, he can prevent that arrow from falling to the ground.

original: kye ma mda' 'di sa la ltung yang ci ma rung snyam nas /
analyzed: kye ma mda' 'di sa la ltung yang ci ma rung snyam nas /
translated: But if he thinks, ‘Oh, how nice it would be if that arrow fell to the ground,’

original: des mda' phyi ma'ang gnam rgyang du ma 'phangs na /
analyzed: des mda' phyi ma'ang gnam rgyang du ma 'phangs na /
translated: and he does not shoot another arrow into the air,

original: mda' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mda' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then the arrow that was shot into the air will fall to the ground.

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'ang ji srid du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa de mngon sum du mi byed
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'ang ji srid du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa de mngon sum du mi byed
translated: do not actualize the ultimate limit as long as those wholesome roots have not ripened into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: kyi / gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de @282b dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon sum du byed de /
analyzed: kyi / gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de @282b dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon sum du byed de /
translated: When those wholesome roots have matured for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, then they actualize the ultimate limit.

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: Subhūti, therefore, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chos 'di dag gi chos nyid la de ltar nges par brtag par bya'o ////
analyzed: chos 'di dag gi chos nyid la de ltar nges par brtag par bya'o ////
translated: should thus ascertain the true nature of these dharmas.”

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa /
translated: Noble Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyi shu lnga pa /🔽de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la /🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bam po nyi shu lnga pa / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Twenty-Fifth Section🔽The Lord having said that,🔽the venerable Subhūti said this to the Lord:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Reverend Lord!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyid 'di la slob pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid la slob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos nyid 'di la slob pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid la slob pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa dang /
translated: “Lord, when bodhisattva great beings train in this dharmatā, train in the limit of reality, train in suchness, train in the dharma-constituent, train in the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gi bar la slob par bgyid kyang bar ma dor ltung bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dka' ba bgyid pa de ni /🔽btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag gi bar la slob par bgyid kyang bar ma dor ltung bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dka' ba bgyid pa de ni / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: and train in the three doors of liberation up to the emptiness of its own mark, and do not fall in between, those bodhisattva great beings’ difficult practice

original: ngo mtshar lags so //
analyzed: ngo mtshar lags so //
translated: is amazing,

original: de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so //
analyzed: de ni mchog tu ngo mtshar lags so //
translated: Lord, it is most amazing.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti,

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yin zhing /
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings do not abandon any sentient beings.

original: de dag ni 'di lta bu'i smon lam gyi khyad par can @283a *//
analyzed: de dag ni 'di lta bu'i smon lam gyi khyad par can @283a *//
translated: They have such special aspirations.

original: yin te / rab 'byor /
analyzed: yin te / rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di lta bu'i sems rlabs po che mngon par bsgrubs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di lta bu'i sems rlabs po che mngon par bsgrubs te /
translated: bodhisattva great beings accomplish such a vast mind.

original: bdag ni sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yin zhing /
analyzed: bdag ni sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yin zhing /
translated: They think, “I will not abandon any sentient beings.

original: bdag kho nas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su thar bar bya'o snyam nas /
analyzed: bdag kho nas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su thar bar bya'o snyam nas /
translated: I alone will liberate all those sentient beings who are dwelling in non-existent phenomena.”

original: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can de dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub par byed /
analyzed: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can de dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mngon par sgrub par byed /
translated: Therefore, bodhisattva great beings accomplish the emptiness gate of liberation for those sentient beings.

original: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par sgrub par byed la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par sgrub par byed la /
translated: Similarly, they accomplish the signlessness gate of liberation and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed pa ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who, until fully awakening to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood, does not actualize the limit of reality in the interim,🔽

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag la thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag la thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: “The bodhisattva great beings who, until they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, do not actualize the very limit of reality in the interim are skilled in means with regard to the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni zab mo'i gnas gang dag yin pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni zab mo'i gnas gang dag yin pa /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings constantly investigate those profound subjects,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: nang stong pa nyid nas /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid nas /
translated: inner emptiness, up to

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar de dag la rtag tu so sor rtog par byed cing /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar de dag la rtag tu so sor rtog par byed cing /
translated: the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, and similarly the four applications of mindfulness, up to the eightfold noble path.

original: @283b rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la rtag tu so sor rtog par byed la 'di ltar yang sems mngon par sgrub ste /
analyzed: @283b rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la rtag tu so sor rtog par byed la 'di ltar yang sems mngon par sgrub ste /
translated: They constantly discern the three doors of liberation and accomplish the following thought:

original: sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba /
translated: ‘For a long time, these sentient beings have come under the influence of negative companions.

original: bdag tu lta ba'i dmigs pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: bdag tu lta ba'i dmigs pa la spyod pa /
translated: They engage in the focal object of the view of self.

original: de bzhin du sems can lta bu'i dmigs pa nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du sems can lta bu'i dmigs pa nas /
translated: Similarly, they engage in the focal object of sentient beings,🔽up to the focal object of the experiencer and the one who causes experience.

original: tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po'i bar du lta ba spang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po'i bar du lta ba spang ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to abandon the view,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed la /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed la /
translated: they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de dag de ltar dmigs par spyod pa'i sems can dag la chos ston par byed de /
analyzed: de dag de ltar dmigs par spyod pa'i sems can dag la chos ston par byed de /
translated: They teach the Dharma to sentient beings who engage in such focal objects.

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon sum du byas nas /
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon sum du byas nas /
translated: At that time, the bodhisattva great beings enter into the meditative stabilization of the emptiness door of liberation.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the fruit of entering the stream,🔽the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
translated: arhatship,

original: rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed do //
translated: or individual enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe /🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin tam /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings🔽enter into the meditative absorption of the signlessness gate of liberation

original: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de nyid kyi tshe na /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de nyid kyi tshe na /
translated: or the meditative absorption of wishlessness,

original: de la zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de la zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: all uncontaminated phenomena are indeed manifest to them.🔽However, they do not actualize the very limit of reality

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon sum du byas nas /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon sum du byas nas /
translated: in such a way that they would actualize

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas /
translated: the fruit of entering the stream,🔽up to arhatship

original: rang byang chub kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par @284a *//🔽'gyur ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' re zhig mngon sum du mi byed do //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par @284a *//🔽'gyur ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' re zhig mngon sum du mi byed do //
translated: or individual enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems bskyed pa 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan pa ni bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi byed la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems bskyed pa 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan pa ni bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du'ang mi byed la /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that, with these thoughts aroused and endowed with those wholesome roots, do not actualize the very limit of reality in the interim.

original: bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba nas /
translated: They do not regress from the four concentrations, the four formless absorptions, and the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro; ;rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar las yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro; ;rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and they do not regress from the noble eightfold path, and they do not regress from the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, they will not regress from the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, the great friendliness, the great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not regress from all the dharmas on the side of awakening and all the buddhadharmas until they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.”🔽“

original: de ni rtag tu thabs @284b la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dang / chos dkar po dag gis rnam par 'phel ba dang / de'i dbang po dag kyang ji ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gi dbang po lta bu ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni rtag tu thabs @284b la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa dang / chos dkar po dag gis rnam par 'phel ba dang / de'i dbang po dag kyang ji ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag gi dbang po lta bu ma yin gyi /
translated: They are always accompanied by skillful means,🔽they increase in virtuous qualities,

original: chos rno bar 'gyur ro; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: chos rno bar 'gyur ro; ;rab 'byor /
translated: and their faculties are not like those of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams mthong na /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams mthong na /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings see sentient beings,

original: 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas phyin ci log bzhi po /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas phyin ci log bzhi po /
translated: they think, ‘For a long time these sentient beings have been engaged in the four errors,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely:

original: rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag tu 'du shes dang / sdug par 'du shes pa la spyod pa dag ste /
analyzed: rtag pa'i 'du shes dang / bde ba'i 'du shes dang / bdag tu 'du shes dang / sdug par 'du shes pa la spyod pa dag ste /
translated: the notion of permanence, the notion of happiness, the notion of self, and the notion of beauty.

original: sems can de dag gi don du byang chub tu spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi don du byang chub tu spyad par bya ste /
translated: I will practice for the sake of those sentient beings,

original: ci nas kyang myur du bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la /
analyzed: ci nas kyang myur du bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la /
translated: so that as soon as possible I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de dag la 'di lta ste /🔽mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de dag la 'di lta ste / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa zhes bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o //
translated: They think, ‘I should practice in such a way

original: zhes bya bar chos ston pa de ltar spyad par bya'o snyam du sems te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar chos ston pa de ltar spyad par bya'o snyam du sems te /
translated: that I can teach the Dharma to them, saying, “This is impermanent, this is suffering, this is selfless, this is impure,” and, “Nirvāṇa is peace.”’

original: de sems bskyed pa de dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod mod kyi /
analyzed: de sems bskyed pa de dang ldan zhing thabs la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod mod kyi /
translated: Endowed with that thought and skilled in means, they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la ni snyoms par 'jug par mi byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la ni snyoms par 'jug par mi byed do //
translated: But they do not rest in the buddhas’ meditative stabilization.

original: de de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rdzogs pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: de de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rdzogs pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: At that time they are endowed with the completion of the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de'ang chos de dag la snyoms par @285a *//
analyzed: de'ang chos de dag la snyoms par @285a *//
translated: They rest in meditative equipoise on those dharmas🔽and

original: 'jug pa dang ldan pa'ang byed mod kyi /
analyzed: 'jug pa dang ldan pa'ang byed mod kyi /
translated: and he does indeed practice the applications of mindfulness,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ni mi byed do //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ni mi byed do //
translated: but until he has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, he does not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams mthong na 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas; sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams mthong na 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas; sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings see beings, they think, ‘Alas, for a long time these beings have come under the influence of bad friends,

original: dmigs par lta ba /
analyzed: dmigs par lta ba /
translated: have a view of a basis,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,

original: bdag ces bya ba'am /
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba'am /
translated: a self,

original: sems can zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: sems can zhes bya ba'am /
translated: a being,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and similarly, connect this with each, up to

original: shes pa po'i bar zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: shes pa po'i bar zhes bya ba'am /
translated: a knower,

original: de bzhin du gzugs zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs zhes bya ba'am /
translated: and similarly, form,

original: tshor ba zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: tshor ba zhes bya ba'am /
translated: feeling,

original: 'du shes zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'du shes zhes bya ba'am /
translated: perception,

original: 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'am /
translated: and consciousness,

original: phung po rnams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: phung po rnams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: and aggregates,

original: khams rnams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: khams rnams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Or, “the constituents”🔽

original: skye mched rnams zhes bya ba la spyod pa dag ste /🔽bdag gis tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can de dag la ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na /
analyzed: skye mched rnams zhes bya ba la spyod pa dag ste / bdag gis tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can de dag la ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na /
translated: They are engaged in the elements or the sense spheres.

original: sems can de dag gi dmigs par lta ba'i skyon 'di dag mi 'byung bar sems can de dag bdag gis de ltar bya'o snyam du sems te /
analyzed: sems can de dag gi dmigs par lta ba'i skyon 'di dag mi 'byung bar sems can de dag bdag gis de ltar bya'o snyam du sems te /
translated: They think, “I will act in such a way that, by means of the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the four means of attracting disciples, I will bring it about that, when I have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment, those sentient beings will not give rise to the faults of views that are objects of observation.”

original: de sems bskyed pa de dag dang ldan zhing thabs la @285b mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: de sems bskyed pa de dag dang ldan zhing thabs la @285b mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: Endowed with those thoughts and with skillful means, they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan yang sems can rnams la lta bas ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan yang sems can rnams la lta bas ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed la /
translated: although they have perfected the ten powers of the tathāgatas and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, they do not actualize the very limit of reality on account of beings.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And they will perfect the cultivation of the meditative stabilization on emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sems can sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba dag mthong na /
analyzed: sems can sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song ba dag mthong na /
translated: see beings who have fallen under the sway of bad friends.

original: 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas mtshan ma dag la spyod pa dag ste /
analyzed: 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas mtshan ma dag la spyod pa dag ste /
translated: They think, ‘Alas, for a long time these beings have been practicing with signs.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: bud med kyi mtshan ma dang / skyes pa'i mtshan ma dang / gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyi mtshan ma la spyod pa dag yin te /
analyzed: bud med kyi mtshan ma dang / skyes pa'i mtshan ma dang / gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyi mtshan ma la spyod pa dag yin te /
translated: They are those who engage in the signs of women, the signs of men, the signs of forms, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena.

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na /
translated: They think, ‘I must act in such a way that, when I have attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,

original: sems can de dag gi skyon de dag mi 'byung bar bdag gis de dag de ltar bya'o snyam du sems so //
analyzed: sems can de dag gi skyon de dag mi 'byung bar bdag gis de dag de ltar bya'o snyam du sems so //
translated: those faults will not occur among sentient beings.’

original: de sems bskyed pa de dang ldan te /
analyzed: de sems bskyed pa de dang ldan te /
translated: Endowed with that spiritual intent,

original: thabs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa dag dang ldan yang sems can rnams la lta bas ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed la /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs pa dag dang ldan yang sems can rnams la lta bas ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed la /
translated: they are skilled in means and, while endowed with the ten powers of the tathāgatas and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas, they do not actualize the finality of existence because they look to sentient beings.

original: @286a *// de'i tshe stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽rab 'byor / 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de /
analyzed: @286a *// de'i tshe stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // rab 'byor / 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de /
translated: At that time, the cultivation of the meditative stabilizations of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness will also be perfected.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa /
translated: Subhūti, it is impossible and there is no chance that a bodhisattva great being who practices the six perfections

original: nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed pa /🔽ye shes kyi chos de lta bu dang ldan pa ni 'du byed rnams la bde bar 'du shes bskyed pa'am /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed pa / ye shes kyi chos de lta bu dang ldan pa ni 'du byed rnams la bde bar 'du shes bskyed pa'am /
translated: and is familiar with inner emptiness🔽will generate the idea that compounded phenomena are pleasant

original: 'du byed rnams la bde bar brjod pa'am /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams la bde bar brjod pa'am /
translated: or will say that compounded phenomena are pleasant

original: khams gsum pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: khams gsum pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa de ni gnas med do //
translated: or will live together with the three realms.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa la /
translated: For a bodhisattva great being who practices like that

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos 'di dag la yongs su 'dris par byas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos 'di dag la yongs su 'dris par byas nas /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings who wish to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should familiarize themselves with these phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la /
translated: They should enter into the meditative stabilization of emptiness.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: How should they actualize the reality limit by which they will attain the fruit of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the fruit of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am /
translated: the fruit of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid dam /
translated: the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur zhing skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / dngos po med pa mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' ji ltar mngon sum du mi bya zhes yongs su dri bar @286b bya'o; ;de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur zhing skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / dngos po med pa mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' ji ltar mngon sum du mi bya zhes yongs su dri bar @286b bya'o; ;de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: or a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, but not actualize nonproduction, noncessation, nonconditioning, and the absence of things?”

original: smon pa med pa la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pa la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be applied extensively to wishlessness.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis yongs su dris pa na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gis yongs su dris pa na /
translated: “Subhūti, if other bodhisattva mahāsattvas ask a bodhisattva mahāsattva practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: 'di skad ces byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad sgom pa ni des stong pa nyid yid la bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad sgom pa ni des stong pa nyid yid la bya'o //
translated: and he answers, ‘You should bring to mind emptiness,

original: des mtshan ma med pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa nyid yid la bya'o //
analyzed: des mtshan ma med pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa nyid yid la bya'o //
translated: you should bring to mind signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: des mngon par 'du bya ba med pa nyid dang / 'gag pa med pa nyid yid la bya'o zhes lan 'debs shing /
analyzed: des mngon par 'du bya ba med pa nyid dang / 'gag pa med pa nyid yid la bya'o zhes lan 'debs shing /
translated: You should bring to mind non-conditioning and non-cessation.

original: gal te sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar sems bskyed pa nye bar mi ston tam /
analyzed: gal te sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar sems bskyed pa nye bar mi ston tam /
translated: If he does not teach the generation of the mind that does not abandon all sentient beings,

original: thabs la mkhas pas lan mi 'debs na /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pas lan mi 'debs na /
translated: and does not answer with skillful means,

original: de'i tshe de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis rigs kyi bu 'di ni; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis rigs kyi bu 'di ni; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: At that time, those bodhisattva great beings should know that this son of a good family has not been prophesied by those buddha bhagavāns to the unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su dris pa gang yin pa de mi brjod mi ston rab tu mi 'byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su dris pa gang yin pa de mi brjod mi ston rab tu mi 'byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those bodhisattva great beings do not explain, do not teach, do not make clear, the questions about the irreversible level of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti, this bodhisattva great being

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la ji lta ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yongs su 'dris par byas nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la ji lta ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yongs su 'dris par byas nas /
translated: has not practiced the six perfections as they are on the irreversible level of the bodhisattva great beings,

original: bsrabs pa'i sa la 'jug par bya @287a *//
analyzed: bsrabs pa'i sa la 'jug par bya @287a *//
translated: and has not entered the level of thinning.

original: ba ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ba ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that.

original: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi ba'i rnam grangs de mchis lags sam /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa zhes bgyi ba'i rnam grangs de mchis lags sam / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: He said, “Reverend Lord, is there a category of irreversible great bodhisattva beings?”

original: rab 'byor / yod de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / yod de /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “There is, Su­bhūti!

original: rab 'byor / gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de pha rol tu phyin pa drug thob kyang rung /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de pha rol tu phyin pa drug thob kyang rung /
translated: Su­bhūti, if irreversible bodhisattvas have attained

original: ma thob kyang rung /
analyzed: ma thob kyang rung /
translated: or have not attained🔽the six perfections,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ji lta ba de ltar lan 'debs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ji lta ba de ltar lan 'debs pa'o //
translated: they will answer in the manner of irreversible great bodhisattva beings.”

original: gsol pa / kye ma btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / kye ma btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Ah! Reverend Lord!

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub tu spyod pa ni mang lags na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub tu spyod pa ni mang lags na /
translated: Although there are many bodhisattvas who practice the conduct that leads to enlightenment,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa yongs su sbyang ba'i sa'am /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa yongs su sbyang ba'i sa'am /
translated: how can one know that a great bodhisattva being is irreversible from the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas?

original: yongs su sbyang ba ma lags pa'i sa la gnas pa ltar gang de skad du lan 'debs pa ni nyung lags so //
analyzed: yongs su sbyang ba ma lags pa'i sa la gnas pa ltar gang de skad du lan 'debs pa ni nyung lags so //
translated: Those who answer like that are few, who are on the stage of not complete training.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhuti, it is so, it is so.

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyis la de ltar lung bstan pa de dag ni nyung ngo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyis la de ltar lung bstan pa de dag ni nyung ngo //
translated: Subhuti, it is because those Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas who are irreversible through the wisdom of non-retrogression and are thus predicted are few.

original: gang dag lung bstan pa de dag ni de skad du lan 'debs te /
analyzed: gang dag lung bstan pa de dag ni de skad du lan 'debs te /
translated: Those who are predicted answer like that.

original: de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be known that they have planted the roots of virtue.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i @287b 'jig rten gyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no //🔽de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i @287b 'jig rten gyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no // de nas bcom ldan 'das la /
translated: Those Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas are not to be swayed by the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhuti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags /
translated: “What is the sameness of the bodhisattva great beings in which bodhisattva great beings should train?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Lord having been asked this, said to the venerable Su­bhūti,

original: rab 'byor / nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: “Su­bhūti, the emptiness of internal phenomena is the sameness of the bodhisattva great beings.🔽Similarly, Su­bhūti,

original: de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang / rab 'byor /
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang / rab 'byor /
translated: the emptiness of external phenomena,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and in the same vein, Su­bhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yin te /
translated: the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, up to and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, is the sameness of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
analyzed: rab 'byor / stong pa nyid de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
translated: “Subhūti, all those emptinesses are the sameness of the bodhisattva great beings

original: kyi mnyam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: kyi mnyam pa nyid yin no //
translated: in which, having trained, the bodhisattva great beings fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzugs kyi bas pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mi skye ba la slob na /
analyzed: ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzugs kyi bas pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mi skye ba la slob na /
translated: if bodhisattva great beings train in the cessation and nonproduction of form,

original: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /🔽de bzhin du gang tshor @288a *//
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam / de bzhin du gang tshor @288a *//
translated: are they training in the knowledge of all aspects?🔽Similarly, if they train in the cessation and nonproduction of feeling,

original: ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i bas pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mi skye ba la slob na /
analyzed: ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i bas pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mi skye ba la slob na /
translated: perception, volitional factors, and consciousness,

original: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: Is that training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Venerable Transcendent Victor,

original: ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bas pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mi skye ba la slob na /
analyzed: ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bas pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mi skye ba la slob na /
translated: if a bodhisattva great being trains in the cessation and non-arising of the six perfections,

original: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /🔽de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la'ang sbyar bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam / de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la'ang sbyar bar bgyi'o //
translated: is that training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Similarly, it should be applied to the establishments of mindfulness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi bas pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mi skye ba la slob na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi bas pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mi skye ba la slob na /
translated: In the same vein, if a bodhisattva great being trains in the cessation and non-arising of , up to and including the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam /
translated: is that training in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;rab 'byor /
translated: The Blessed One replied to the venerable Su­bhūti as follows:

original: 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: “What do you think, Su­bhūti?

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am /
translated: Do you think that the real nature of physical forms is something that is exhausted,

original: spong ba'am / 'gag par 'gyur snyam mam /
analyzed: spong ba'am / 'gag par 'gyur snyam mam /
translated: abandoned, or ceases?

original: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” He replied, “No, Blessed One!

original: ma lags so //
analyzed: ma lags so //
translated: No, Gautama!

original: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: ” “What do you think, Su­bhūti?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am /
translated: Do you think that the real nature of feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness is something that is exhausted,

original: spong ba'am @288b 'gag par 'gyur snyam mam /
analyzed: spong ba'am @288b 'gag par 'gyur snyam mam /
translated: abandoned, or ceases?

original: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” He replied, “No, Blessed One!

original: ma lags so //
analyzed: ma lags so //
translated: No, Gautama!

original: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: ” “What do you think, Su­bhūti?

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am /
translated: Do you think that the real nature of the six transcendent perfections is something that is exhausted,

original: spong ba'am / 'gag par 'gyur snyam mam /🔽gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: spong ba'am / 'gag par 'gyur snyam mam / gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: abandoned, or ceases?🔽” He replied, “No, Blessed One!

original: ma lags so //
analyzed: ma lags so //
translated: No, Gautama!

original: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi po de dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Is the suchness of those four applications of mindfulness, and similarly, connect this with each,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am /
translated: up to the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha exhausted,

original: spong ba'am / 'gag par 'gyur snyam mam /🔽gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: spong ba'am / 'gag par 'gyur snyam mam / gsol pa / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
translated: or annihilated, or stopped?

original: ma lags so //
analyzed: ma lags so //
translated: He replied, “No it is not, Venerable Transcendent Victor.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di la slob na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di la slob na /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who train in this suchness of phenomena

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin /
translated: train in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin /
translated: They train in the six perfections,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin /
translated: they train in the four applications of mindfulness,

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: and similarly, connect this with each,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la slob pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la slob pa yin no //
translated: up to they train in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'thob bo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'thob bo //
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who trains thus, reaches the perfection of all trainings.

original: bdud dam bdud kyi ras kyi lha rnams kyis thub par mi nus shing /
analyzed: bdud dam bdud kyi ras kyi lha rnams kyis thub par mi nus shing /
translated: He cannot be overcome by Mara or by the gods of Mara's host.

original: myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa rjes su 'thob bo //
analyzed: myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa rjes su 'thob bo //
translated: He will quickly reach the irreversible stage.

original: @289a *// rang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa yin /
analyzed: @289a *// rang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa yin /
translated: He will stand in the Tathagata's sphere of action.

original: mgon med pa'i chos rnams la'ang gnas pa yin /
analyzed: mgon med pa'i chos rnams la'ang gnas pa yin /
translated: He will stand in the Dharma which is without a master.

original: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa yin /
analyzed: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed pa yin /
translated: He will purify his own Buddha-field.

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa yin /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa yin /
translated: He will bring beings to maturity.

original: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la'ang slob pa yin no //
analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la'ang slob pa yin no //
translated: He will train in great love and great compassion.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni lan gsum du bzlas te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni lan gsum du bzlas te /
translated: Subhuti : A Bodhisattva, a great being who trains thus, reaches the perfection of all trainings.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will turn the wheel of the Dharma in its twelve aspects;

original: sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will lead to complete nirvāṇa in the element of nirvāṇa without any aggregates left behind many hundred thousand one hundred million billion sentient beings;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin /
translated: they will be dedicated to the continuity of the lineage of the tathāgatas;

original: 'chi ba med pa'i sgo'ang 'byed pa yin /
analyzed: 'chi ba med pa'i sgo'ang 'byed pa yin /
translated: they will open the door to the deathless;

original: sems can dpag tu med pa grangs med pa tshad med pa dag theg pa gsum po dag la 'god par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can dpag tu med pa grangs med pa tshad med pa dag theg pa gsum po dag la 'god par byed pa yin te /
translated: they will establish in the three vehicles countless, immeasurable sentient beings;

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings training like that train in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis ni bslab pa 'di la slob par mi nus kyi /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis ni bslab pa 'di la slob par mi nus kyi /
translated: Subhūti, those sentient beings with inferior aspirations are not able to train in this training.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad 'khor ba las bsgral bar 'dod pa de bslab pa 'di la slob bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad 'khor ba las bsgral bar 'dod pa de bslab pa 'di la slob bo //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who wishes to liberate all beings from saṃsāra trains in this training.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems @289b dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni nam yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems @289b dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni nam yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye /
translated: Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who trains like this will never be born in the hells,

original: dud 'gro rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dvags kyi yul du mi skye /
analyzed: dud 'gro rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dvags kyi yul du mi skye /
translated: nor will he be born among animals, in the world of Yama, or in the realm of hungry ghosts.

original: mtha' 'khob kyi mi rnams kyi nang du mi skye /
analyzed: mtha' 'khob kyi mi rnams kyi nang du mi skye /
translated: He will not be born among the barbarians in the border regions,

original: rigs dman pa rnams dang / dbul po'i rigs dang / gzhan gyi mngag gzhug bya ba'i rigs su mi skye /
analyzed: rigs dman pa rnams dang / dbul po'i rigs dang / gzhan gyi mngag gzhug bya ba'i rigs su mi skye /
translated: nor will he be born in a low caste, a poor family, or a family of servants.
